"Cire, we invited one boy you might know." Smiling, mom said.

You gasped seeing Ryan Sands walking in. He spotted you immediately and blushed in tune with yourself. "You look breathtaking, Cire." Stunned, he said.

The girls giggled as you blushed even more. "Thank- thank you..." Nervous, you replied. "You look rather dashing yourself."

Cire walked up to you and took your hand into his. You could feel your heart racing as he gently kissed the top of your hand like the gentlemen of old before asking, "May I have this first dance?"

You blushed even more and turned to mom to find her struggling not to laugh at your awkward situation. It was clear to you that she was enjoying this. Only you had to answer him or risk hurting his feelings. With a sigh, you nodded in agreement and began to dance around the room with him with the others following while a slow love ballad played on the sound station...
115113211412.title: skip to the party.

1151132114121.content:
The party started in earnest with you dancing with Ryan and the girls dancing with their boyfriends. Sarah was dancing with her husband and mom was watching from the snack table with a bemused grin. You could not help blush as Ryan placed his free hand against your side as he led you around the room to the beat of the slow music. Your heart raced, you did not know what to do or say. Sure you looked exactly like a girl, with your short stature, narrow frame and rounded shoulders. Even if he were to see you naked... "Don't think about that!" blushing, you thought. "It's not like I'm going to fall for him. Just smile politely, and dance."

You gulped and blushed further as Ryan shyly returned your smile, thinking you were smiling at him and slowly lowered his hand from your side to your hip. You jumped slightly as you felt an unfamiliar chill run up your spine along with an odd warmth beginning to build in deep within your nether regions. You had an idea of what it meant. Worse, the warmth seemed to then start building inside your breast forms as well. You remembered aunt Gwen telling you that the breast forms she gave you had sensors that allowed you to feel with them. You began to realize that they not only looked like real breasts, they acted like them as well.

"Is this guy actually turning me on?" Frightened, you thought. "How is that even possible?"

Nervous, you slowly pushed Ryan's hand back to your side in fear the strange feelings might overwhelm you. You sighed, feeling the sensations slowly subsiding then whispered to Ryan, "Slow down, champ. The party is just starting."

Ryan blushed terribly, his eyes offering his apology to which your eyes gently accepted. You caught mom's eye, she was smiling as if struggling not to laugh. She had seen what had happened and seemed to enjoy every minute of it. Eventually, the song ended and everyone parted for the moment.

"Would you like a drink?" Still blushing, Ryan asked. "Maybe we can find somewhere private to talk."

You blushed, again, frightened that the thought actually sounding flattering. "Um... a drink sounds good." Softly, you said. "Just... we stay where the party is, okay?"

Ryan nodded, looking embarrassed. You touched his hand, bringing the sensations back, causing you to tremble slightly. "I'm not offended, Ryan." Trying to sound reassuring, you said. "You are a fine dancer."

Ryan smiled, his blush growing. "So are you... I'll get us some drinks."

With that, Ryan walked to the snack table while you walked out of the room with mom following. She found you holding onto a table, quietly gasping for breath, begging the strange sensations to subside. "What's wrong, Cire?" Worry in her voice, she said. "Did Ryan's move make you feel that uncomfortable?"

Shaking and teary eyed, you quickly explained what had happened during the dance. "It was overwhelming, mom." Quivering, you said. "How could I be falling for him?"

Mom sighed. "You are just reacting as any other person would in your situation." Calmly, she explained. "It's just your fear getting the best of you."

"I don't know..." Wincing, you said. "I have never felt this way before... I'm scared."

"Don't think about it." Firmly but kindly, mom ordered. "No one is going to try anything cute while the cheer coach and I here. You have nothing to worry about."

She stopped talking as Ryan turned the corner, looking concerned. "Is Cire okay?" Wincing, he asked. "I didn't do anything wrong, did I?"

Mom smiled politely at Ryan. "You have nothing to worry about, young man." Firmly but kindly, she said. "Cire is just..."
1151132114121.title: the party continues.

11511321141213.content:
Mom smiled politely at Ryan. "You have nothing to worry about, young man." Firmly but kindly, she said. "Cire is just..."

You winced, fearing she was going to say that you were shy or having your first period but you released a breath when she said, "...having a rough day."

"That's... putting it mildly." Muttering, you said.

"I'm sorry to hear that." Kindly, Ryan said. He placed the two cups of punch he was holding onto a table. "Turn around, I might be able to help."

Uncertain, you turned around and Ryan began to gently massage your shoulders in a way that nearly made you melt on the spot. Your knees began to shake and Ryan guided you into a chair as he continued to massage your shoulders. You saw mom smiling like before, trying hard not to laugh at your situation. A low moan escaped your lips as you felt your body relaxing. It was unnerving to you that Ryan seemed to have so much power over you but the way he was so easily relaxing your body made you hesitant to ask him to stop.

"Where did you learn this, Ryan?" Bemused, mom asked.

"My mother is a masseuse and taught me all sorts of techniques in case she needed a massage herself." Smiling, Ryan replied. "I thought everyone knew with my sister being the gossip queen and all."

Suddenly, Ryan stopped and you turned, somewhat disappointed to find the girls and their boyfriends peering into the room. All of them had bemused to amused smiles on their faces causing both you and Ryan to blush profusely.

"It looks like my twin sister is growing up." Teasing, she said. "One dance and you two are already an item."

Mom giggled. "Cire was having a rough day so Ryan was kind enough to massage her stress away." Smiling, she explained. "Only I think she's a bit disappointed that he suddenly stopped."

This brought giggles and laughs before a tall, muscular boy with short brown hair and green eyes approached. You knew him as Emily's boyfriend, Frank Jones. "First day as an official cheerleader and you are already sweeping boys off their feet." Grinning, he said. "He then carefully whispered. "You transitioned nicely."

Hearing him, you blushed even more. Frank knew you were a boy, having dated Emily for a while and guessed that they told him you had transitioned from male to female due to the malpractice incident. "We- We're just friends." Lamely, you said.

"Yeah... just- just friends." Blushing, Ryan agreed.

"Sure you are." Smiling, Frank said.

As he walked off, the second boy walked up with Susan at his side. He was near her height with longish blond hair and brown eyes. "I'm Ty Rodgers." politely, he said. "Susan told me a lot about you." he smiled. "I never thought I would ever see such a shy tomboy."

"She's only shy when she has to bring out her feminine side." Grinning, Susan said. "It makes her feel a bit out of her element."

You nodded at that as it was pretty much true, making Ty smile. "You got nothing to worry about with us around." Firmly but kindly, he said. "We'll keep an eye on you."

You gave a weak smile as the next boy walked up with Amy. He was tall and slender with unkempt black hair and green eyes behind a pair of large round glasses. "The name is Dan Harbor." Politely, he said. "It's a pleasure to meet you, Cire."

"Th- Thank you." shyly, you replied.

Dan smiled. "No need to be shy around us." Calmly, he said. "We are all an extended family here, look out for each other."

"Dan is the team kicker." Smiling, Amy said. "He's also the backup quarterback."

The two walked back to the party as Bree walked up with a tall and muscular man holding her by the arm. He had longish brown hair and piercing green eyes. "So this is the mysterious shy tomboy Bree has been babbling about all afternoon." Making you blush again, he said. "You seem physically fit but you need to gain some confidence."

"This is my boyfriend, Karl Flint." Smiling, Bree said. "He's the quarterback of the school football team and physical motivator at the local gym."

"It- It's a pleasure to meet you." Shyly, you said.

Karl nodded. "I can work with you." Serious, he said. "Come to the gym this weekend, I'll turn you into a real tigress."

Mom giggled at that. "She'll be there." Eyeing you, she said.

"I think we can all use a workout." Hearing the girls' giggles, Sarah said. "We'll all be there this weekend."

The girls stopped giggling as Emily carefully whispered in your ear, "If you laugh at who she targets in training, you are next."

You gulped at that and discretely gave her a nod that you understood as the last boy approached with holding Fae by the arm. He was near your height with short black hair and blue eyes. "I'm Erin Arron." smiling, he said. "Yes, I heard all the jokes."

"Erin is the running back for the football team." Smiling, Fae said. "he doesn't talk much but, once you get him started..."

"I get the idea." Giggling, you said. "I can be a chatter box myself at times..."

"You...?" Sarcastically, Emily asked. "No...."

Everyone, including yourself, laughed before you all returned to the party...
11511321141213.title: having a rough day.

choices: your room now suited a teen girl.
115113211412131.content:
The party went well, everyone had a great time. The cheerleaders and their football player boyfriends welcomed you to the cheer squad and said their goodbyes as they left until only Ryan was left. He took your hand into his own, looking you in the eye which made you blush. "I had a great time, Cire." Smiling, he said. "Maybe we can get together again sometime."

"Yeah... maybe we can." Giving a nervous smile, you said.

There was an awkward pause. You knew Ryan was hoping for a kiss but you were not certain you were ready to go that far just yet. Just as Ryan was about to release you and walk away, mom gave you a discrete shove forward. A yelp escaped your lips, causing Ryan to turn your way just as your lips made contact with his own! Knowing you were now committed, you pulled him into to you and gave him a kiss deep enough to leave some of your lipstick on his lips. Upon releasing him, he stumbled back a step before looking at you, stunned. "Wow..." Whispering, he said, blushing. "What a kiss...!"

He moved forward, hoping for a second kiss but you stopped him. "That was for being a gentleman, Ryan." Firmly but kindly, you said. "You'll have to earn that second kiss."

Ryan walked away in silence, an odd smile on his face. You watched him walk away towards the bemused faces of the other cheerleaders and football players before closing the door. "That boy is in love..." Grinning, Emily teased.

"Did you have to shove me, mom?!" Embarrassed, you demanded. "I thought you said you were not going to face this!"

"I'll admit I gave you a little nudge." Smiling, mom said. "Only you have to admit, you were tempted to give him that kiss. i just helped you out before it became too late to make that decision."

"Just promise me that you won't do that again." Annoyed, you said.

Mom sighed. "I promise..." She then smiled. "Why don't you go upstairs and put away your new wardrobe. I helped by making room for it all."

Your eyes went wide. "You took all of my clothes?!"

"You have new clothes, honey." Calmly, mom said.

You ran up the stairs to your bedroom and opened your wardrobe. Everything was gone, every last piece of your male clothing had been taken away! You checked your dresser drawers to find all of the clothing there gone as well! Gulping, you looked around to find....
115113211412131.title: After the party.

choices: That night, you have a dream.
Mom and Emily have a talk.
1151132114121313.content:
"Where are my clothes?!" Angrily, you demanded.

"In storage about a mile away from here." Serious, Emily said. "Nothing was thrown out."

"I was told I would not be forced into anything!" Tearing up, you said. "Was that a lie?!"

Emily sighed. "I will admit that mom went a little too far." Frowning, she said. "However, you are going to be stuck as one of the girls for the rest of the school year. Taking away all of your male clothing was only to ensure there will be no wardrobe malfunctions."

"It still doesn't make it right." Pouting, you countered. "What if I decide I don't want to be a girl at the end of the year?"

"Then we will return all of your normal clothes and you can continue where you left off in a new school where no one knows you." Serious, Emily replied. She took a step closer. "You have to admit that you were slowly dying inside as you were. Something had to be done."

"And you think making me one of the girls was the answer..." Crying, you said. "I don't feel like a girl, I don't know how I feel!" You shuddered. "Worse, mom made me kiss that boy..."

"It's only your first day, Cire." Softly, Emily said. "I'm sorry everything moved as quickly as it did and I promise I will talk to mom about tonight." She sat down on the bed next to you and took your hand into her own. "Just promise me that you will give this a chance. We are only doing this to help you, to give you a reason to hold your head up high again."

You sighed, still sobbing. You were frightened and uncertain. Your entire world got turned upside down in less than a single day and mom pressuring you like she did was not helping. Finally, you gave a short nod before saying, "Just... no more surprises, okay?"

Emily smiled before giving you a sisterly hug. Thank you, Cire." Whispering, she said. "I'll help you get ready to call it a day and then help you get ready for school tomorrow."

After getting you out of the dress and cleaned up, Emily helped you put away your new all feminine wardrobe before helping you into a nightgown. It was really nothing more than an oversized shirt with feminine frills on the sleeves and collar. It reached down to your ankles making it feel more like a dress but at least it was comfortable.

"Be ready to get up early tomorrow, Cire." Smiling, Emily said. "It takes girls a bit longer to get ready in the morning than boys."

You sighed and nodded, wanting nothing more than to go to bed...
1151132114121313.title: Emily wanting to talk.

choices: Your Mom is actually a Man, and your Dad is actually a Girl.
121.content:
Earlier in the day, you'd been looking for batteries for the remote, and couldn't find any anywhere in the house, you were in your parent's Bedroom, when you randomly decided to check the closet.

You stumble upon something strange, deep in the closet you find several large boxes with breast forms, some sort of padding that could be worn, a jockstrap with a built in bulge and other odds and ends.

Later that day you asked your parents about them. They both had a surprised realization look to them

They sit down and begin explaining...
121.title: Prosthetics

1211.content:
Dad begins explaining that he was a woman, and technically still is, and has been dressing and acting as a man since His years in highschool, when he met your Mom, A guy, who acted and dressed as a woman.

You hadn't noticed but while Dad was Explaining, your Mom had unbuttoned her blouse nad removed her breast forms.

You sat there shocked, and started to say something when Dad took off his shirt showing you his bound breasts.

Andrea couldn't take it anymore. The pleasure was too intense to the point of being painful.....it felt like being stuck at verge of orgasm times 100 but never stopping....

"Please....stop....I'm sorrrrryyy...." She moaned as the collar suddenly beeped as the feelings stopped.

Randy clapped for her gently. "You see you can be a good girl too Raven....that necklace only controls people temporarily and requires a lot of mental energy from the wearer to maintain. However with the training you will get here you will become and wonderful and obedient as Star here with no need for any mind control." He said as he painted her head and walked away.

Andrea couldn't believe he spit she was in. She had her free will back true, however she was still no less a slave and now stuck here.....
13121111111111121221.title: 1st day of conditioning

13121111111112.content: Tonight was the most famous frat party of the year, everyone will be there and actually this is a mandatory event, if you don’t want to be an outcast for the complete season!
13121111111112.title: Frat party

132.content:
"We think this is the easier one." the agent says.

"What do you mean?" you ask.

"If you are a teen girl, the killer would never look for you at a high school, and then we put you in the care of two other people in witness protection. You can pull off the look without surgery, just high quality prosthetics."

"Fine..." you say and the agent smiles.

"Okay, let's get you started."
132.title: A young teen girl who is in high school

1322.content:
You step through the door, to your surprise there are two fairly young women waiting on the other side of the table. They both sit down, and you follow suit.

"Hi Miles, I'm Sara," said the one on the left. She's a tall blonde with a hefty bust on display through her deep vee neck.

"and I'm Clara." said the other. She's a slightly shorter Asian.

"I'm, uh, Miles, they said I'd meet the people who will be acting as my parents in here..."

"That's us," Sara said.

"But you're both girls, and you're both younger than I expected. How are you supposed to be my parents?"

"First of all, we're married, so that is no concern," Clara begins, "You'd think that in this day and age you would be able to realize that. Secondly, I'm 34, I'm easily old enough to be your mother."

"I'm 20 how does that work." You attempt to retort.

"No, you're 16, and we adopted you after college when you were 5." Sara calmly explains. "But you'll get plenty of that when they drill you on your dossier."

"Excuse me," the agent comes in, "they need you for..."
1322.title: Meeting your "parents"

13222.content:
The agent walks you to a dark room with a single chair. You sit down and a projector screen is lowered in front of you and the projector behind you is turned on.

The first slide is labeled "Amelia Beckett," and has a picture of a building called

"Hello, I'm Agent Carlson, I'll be briefing you on your new life. You are Amelia 'Mila' Beckett, adopted daughter of Sara and Clara Beckett. You were born in San Fransisco, but your parents left you at the hospital. You were placed in foster care until Sara and Clara adopted you at five years old."

He goes to the next slide a map of the United States with stars on San Fransisco, Washington D.C., Austin, and Seattle.

"Your family lived in San Fransisco for three years, the DC suburbs for four years, Austin for four more years, and you've just moved to Seattle. Clara works for Homeland Security which is why you've moved so much. Your other mother, Sara, works as a teacher."

He turns on the light and hands you a binder. "This is your dossier. It has all of the details about your life, you should memorize key facts. Now let's..."Ge
13222.title: Going over your new life

132221.content:
"Now let's get your prosthetics put on." The Agent leads you to the next room over. It has a strange look to it. It has the same sterile and authoritarian aesthetic as the previous rooms, but will salon chairs and make-up vanities.

"See that screen in the corner," he motions to a folding screen across the room, "stand behind there and strip down. I'll send in someone to take measurements. From there we will determine what sort of prosthetics you need."

"Umm... yes sir." You feel awkward about someone seeing you even mostly naked, but it isn't like you have an option. You around the screen. There is an empty clothes bin, and a bench. You quickly strip down to your briefs and take a seat on the bench. You've barely had time to sit when a woman walks in. She's a mature woman, probably in her early 50s, and dressed in a very professional skirt suit and holding a clipboard.

"Hello, Mila, if you stand up we can get started." She pulls a tape measure from her pocket.

"I'm not Mila, I'm..." you start when you realize she's using your new name, "Sorry, yeah, I'm Mila, and why is a woman doing this, I don't know if I feel comfortable with you seeing me so underdressed."

"Why would a guy make a girl like you feel more comfortable?"

"Because... well..." You want to insist on your masculinity, but know it's probably a lost cause. "Can we just get started?"

"We can." She begins moving you through a variety of positions, all the while taking the measurements and copying them down on her clipboard. After what feels like an hour, but was probably less she puts her measuring tape back and says, "That's it, I'll go plug these into the computer. If you'd like to wait here I'll come back with the prosthetics."
132221.title: Get your prosthetics put on

13223.content:
Sara comes up to you and sats down and says lokks Miles you know you can wear the prosthetics that will look real and feel sort of real or, or what? Well i could inject you with an experimental serum and then you would be a real teenage girl.

You would still be you it just effects your body not your mind and there is an antidote to so once this is all over you can just change back to your male self.

You think about it and i guess wearing the prosthetics there is a chance i could be caght, so i guess I'll take the injection.

Sara then leaves and comes back the injected you then helped you to your room and stayed stayed with you.

It took all night and it was....
13223.title: Something Else

133.content:
"So what your telling me is your going to turn me into a girl without surgery?" I asked.

"Well, yes" the second agent, a man who looked to be in his mid 50's, said. "but there's a catch"

"What's the catch" I asked.

"You see" the third agent, a woman who looked to be in her early 30's, said, "we are going to be injecting you with a serum that will restructure you DNA so you will appear as though you've been born a girl. With the right medications, it shouldn't be all to painful"

"So what's the good news?" I asked.

"That was the good news" the first agent said.

"You see" the third agent started, "once you've been injected your body will begin to recognize the serum as a harmful subject and build up immunities to it"

"Meaning?" I asked.

"It means that if we were to inject you again in an attempt to change you back your body would reject the serum and you could possibly die" the second agent said.

There was a long and somewhat awkward quietness as I processed what I had just been told. Then the first agent said "we're going to be moving you to Michigan where you will go to school and live with another agent and his family"

"Michigan, why there?" I asked.

"Because you have no family there and from what you've told us you've never traveled there" the third agent said.

"We want you to understand" the second agent said, "this man is wanted in 8 southern states for murder. Half of his murder victims are witnesses"

"I understand. I just need a moment to wrap my head around all this" I said.

"Once we've captured this guy, and we will, you will be aloud to return here to Florida and reconnect with your friends and family" the first agent said.

"Ok then, let's get this started" I said.

They led me into what looked like a standard hospital recovery room. There was a doctor and a nurse, both of whom were female.

"If you could take a seat right here Miles, Nurse Smith will begin the process" the doctor said, gesturing to the bed.

"Alright" I said as I did what I was told.

The nurse proceeded to give me a shot. After about 30 seconds, I began to feel drowsy. "So when is this **yawn** stuff supposed to take effect" I asked.

"That was just something so you'll sleep through your translation" the nurse said. "I don't think your going to want to see yourself changing"

"Oh, alrig" I said as I began to fell asleep. I did however see the nurse inject me with the serum before being out for the count.
133.title: Someone else

choices: You are in an orphanage (no family)
You are in a big bedroom (rich family)
You are in an average bedroom (middle-class family)
134.content:
"Wait, what?!" you asked incredulously. "I thought there wasn't going to be surgery involved!"

"Oh, there isn't. Agents, if you would." one of the agents commanded as he snapped his fingers.

Suddenly,the other two left the room and came back with what appeared to be a naked five year old girl in a tube of green liquid. When you looked inside, you saw similar facial features to your own face. This caused you to gasp in shock.

"We took the liberty of producing a young, female clone of you, Miles. This way, it won't be weird being in a different body." the lead agent explained.

"But, if this is a clone, then who am I going to have for a family?" you asked.

"We've already taken care of that, Ms. Taylor." the lead agent said as he injected you with a syringe of blue liquid. Before you could retaliate, you fell into a deep sleep. When you woke up...
134.title: A little five-year-old girl

14.content:
You're Kevin, a mildly apathetic high school senior, 5'9", medium-length brown hair, all in all pretty average-looking and normal. You're currently walking out of your last class, debating whether you're going to show up to school tomorrow, when Rebecca runs up to you.

"OMG Kevin I'm so excited for Saturday! I can't believe Rachel's going to get married! This will be the best wedding ever!"

"Yeah," you grunt back, not really listening. Rebecca was comically excitable and talkative. Normally you wouldn't have much to do with her, except you had been in her class for years and shared a mutual cousin, Rachel, whose wedding you had to go to on Saturday. Not that you disliked Rachel -- you and she actually had a very good relationship and were closer than most cousins. But you always found weddings long, drawn-out, and boring. You had no idea why Rebecca enjoyed them so much.

Then you realized Rebecca was still talking.

"Anyways, I'm going right home immediately to try on my bridesmaid's dress! Want to come help me?"
14.title: Always a Bridesmaid

141.content:
"I guess so. I'm not doing anything." you said.

"Cool! Let's go!" she said.

You went to her house and sat on her bed as she walked into the room, wearing the dress. It was a light pink and actually made her look quite pretty.

"So, what do you think?" she asked.

"You look great," you said.

She left again to take the dress off and came back with it draped over her arms.

"You know, I bet you'd fit in this." she said.

"Hardy har har." you replied.

Later you were sitting at home and you checked your phone and you got a message from Rebecca.

"Hey, I know it's weird, but Rachel wanted me to tell you that you're invited to her bachelorette party."

"What?" you thought.

"Why? Isn't that a girl's only type thing?"

"Come on, she's the bride, she's insisting that you come."

"When is it?"

"Night before the wedding.

"I guess I'll go if she really wants me there."

Sure enough you checked with Rachel and she did indeed want you there. She said it was because you had such a good relationship, but you couldn't help but think she had an ulterior motive.

What's next?
141.title: "Sure"

1411.content:
You show up the night of the party and you walk into Rachel's house. You're uncomfortable because it's all her friends, plus Rebecca and Rachel walks out of her room.

"Okay guys, thank you all for coming." Rachel said. "It's not going to be like a regular bachelorette party, since I invited my cousins. Instead it's going to be a low key night, starting with a trip to the spa."

"Oooh!" the other women said.

"So, everyone follow my car and we'll head there now!" Rachel said. "Rebecca and Kevin, you're with me."

"I'm not really sure why I'm here." you said.

"I told you already. It's because of how good our relationship is." Rachel said.

"Don't worry, men go to spas too." Rebecca said.

"...Fine." you said.

What's next?
1411.title: The night of the party

14111.content:
You walk into the spa after the car ride, with the group and Rachel leads you all to a back room.

"This is the Bachelorette Party special." the woman who worked at the spa said. "You're all going to look ready for a wedding."

The other women start to sit in the chairs, and Rebecca pulls you into a chair next to her.

"Don't worry. It'll be fun." Rebecca said.

"Okay, ladies. Just relax and enjoy yourself." the woman said, as a group of other women walked in, and started to work on each woman, plus yourself.

What's next?
14111.title: At the spa

141111.content:
You sat there and your head was laid back into a basin of water as they started to wash your hair. You heard them talking, but through a combination of the water and the scrubbing, you only got snippets and you weren't even sure what they were talking about, just hearing something about "extensions" and "highlights". You relaxed, and figured that this was some sort of prank, Rachel getting you back for something you did as a kid or something. You'd laugh about it later or something and all would be good.

"He looks so relaxed." Rachel said.

"Yeah." Rebecca said.

The woman who was washing your hair called over another woman, who slipped off your shoes and socks and started to massage your feet, as another woman started to massage your hands. Soon you had french tipped fingernails and toenails. They started to work on your face and you continued to lay there, as makeup was applied to your face and extensions were added to your hair.

They finish and you sit up, glancing into a mirror and you feel...
141111.title: The Bachelorette Treatment (The spa treatment)

1411111.content:
"What did you do?" you shouted.

You stared into the mirror, you were a girl. You had long blonde hair, much longer than your short blonde hair, your face was a girl's face with long eyelashes and shiny lips. If it wasn't you, you might've found this girl pretty attractive.

"Calm down." Rachel said. "Let's go talk in another room."

Rebecca and Rachel led you into another room where you blew up at them.

"How could you do this to me?" you asked. "I'm not a girl, I don't want to be a girl! I'm a guy!"

"Please stop yelling." Rachel said. "Let me explain."

"Try me." you said.

"One of my bridesmaids bailed on me. We already had the dresses, so I just needed someone who fit into it." Rachel said.

"And I remember your measurements from when you got that tuxedo for the wedding. So I told Rachel that you'd fit into it." Rebecca said.

"We knew you'd never agree, so we figured if we did it like this, you couldn't say no." Rachel said.

"What makes you think I'll help you?"

"Please! I need you. Once the ceremony is over you can change into whatever you want. Just for the ceremony at the church."

"Well..." you started.

You stood there at a crossroads. It was a betrayal either way. You either betray your masculinity to help those in need, or you betray those in need to preserve your masculinity. What do you choose?
1411111.title: Shocked

14111111.content:
You sigh, as you look at your cousins, who need your help. You never could say no to them.

"I'll do it." you said.

"Oh, this is great! I'll do anything to make it up to you. After the honeymoon, of course. I'll be busy until then." Rachel said.

"What's next for the party?" Rebecca asked.

"We're going back to my place, have some wine, watch a few movies. Low key night." Rachel said.

"Okay." you said. "I assume you want me present?"

"My bridal party has to be complete here." Rachel said.

"Right." you said.

Later, after the rest of the women were done with their treatments, you made your way back to Rachel's place, where Rebecca led you upstairs to Rachel's room.

"Put these on." she said, handing you a bundle of clothes.

"What are they?"

"Girl's clothes. You need to fit in tonight."

"Right." you checked the bundle out. It was a bra (of course), panties, a pair of girl's skinny jeans and a blouse.

"What, no skirt?" you asked jokingly.

"We'll shave your legs later. This is just to hang out."

You put the clothes on and went downstairs, where Rachel and her friends were spread on the couch, wine glasses in hand.

"Come on and join us," Rachel said. "I'll even let you have a little wine, just don't tell your parents, they'd kill me."

"That reminds me, what will my parents think of this?" you asked.

"Oh they already know. Got them on board a few days ago." Rachel replied.

"They know?"

"Yep."

"Well, I guess everything is taken care of."

"That it is, Kev-uh, do you want us calling you Kevin, even looking like that?" Rebecca asked.

"Hm. You're right. I don't look like a Kevin like this."

"How about Keira?" Rachel suggested,

"Ooh! I like that!" Rebecca said.

"Keira it is." you said.

What next?
14111111.title: I'll do it

141111112.content:
You had... fun if you could call it at the bachelorette party. Although Rachel shouldn't have let you drink wine, because you were toasted. You woke up the next morning on Rachel's couch, with a bad taste in your mouth. You had thought the previous night was a dream, but you were mistaken, you were still Keira. So you got up and walked to the bathroom, where Rebecca was waiting outside, looking as bad as you looked.

"Hey." she said.

"Hey." you said.

"Rachel's just finishing up in there, then she's going over to the place with her maid of honor. The rest of the bridesmaids are meeting here and the limo will take us there after we get ready."

"Oh, joy."

"Lighten up, it'll be fun. You had a lot of fun last night."

"I can't remember last night."

"I'm sure Rachel probably can."

"Oh boy."

Rachel stepped out of the bathroom and smiled at the two of you.

"You are going to look so pretty today. Just remember, it's just for the ceremony. You can wear anything you want at the reception." Rachel said.

"Good." you said.

What's next?
141111112.title: Straight to the wedding

1411111121.content:
You go into the bathroom and do your business which today included shaving your legs. You walked out of the bathroom and Rebecca led to you Rachel's room where two dresses were on the bed, Rebecca's and yours. You picked it up and held it against your body, grimacing.

"This is so girly." you said.

"That's the point." Rebecca said.

Rebecca helped you into a bra and panties, that unfortunately matched the dress and then helped you get the dress on. You sat at Rachel's vanity as Rebecca made your face and hair presentable, before doing her own. You strapped your pink strappy heels and looked at yourself, between the dress, heels, makeup and hair, you'd never be able to tell you were a boy.

"Time to go!" Rebecca said, as she handed you a purse and you walked out to the limo.
1411111121.title: Getting ready

14111111211.content:
You got to the wedding, and had to admit, it was a beautiful ceremony. Sure, you'd rather be sitting watching it, than standing with the bridal party, but whatever. There were a few sniggers from those who knew your identity, but to those who didn't you were just one of Rachel's cousins. After the ceremony ended, and the priest said, "You may now kiss the bride." You relaxed, since it was finally over. You walked over to Rachel as she was giving someone directions to where the reception was going to be.

"Hey, Rachel." you said. "When can I go change?"

"Oh, not yet. We need to take photos." Rachel said.

"Oh, okay." you said, disappointed that you weren't able to change yet. You walked over with Rachel and stood with Rebecca for the pictures.

After that was over, you were walking to the limo with Rebecca.

"I want to change!" you groaned.

"Well, did you bring something to change into?" Rebecca asked.

"Uh, no. I figured that had been handled." you said.

"Ugh. Listen, when we get to the reception hall, I have a change of clothes I was going to wear, I can stay in the dress if you really want to change." Rebecca said.

"I guess that's better than nothing. What about the hair and makeup?" you asked.

"We'll deal with that when we get there." Rebecca said.
14111111211.title: To the Wedding

141111112111.content:
You got to the reception hall and Rebecca walked up to her mother, your Aunt Susan and took a bag from her. Aunt Susan turned to look at you and smiled.

"You look very lovely, Kev... I mean, Keira." she said.

"How does everyone know?" you thought as Rebecca led you to the ladies room.

"Okay, so this is what I have." Rebecca said, taking the items out of the bag. "I have a nice casual dress, with matching sandals, or a skirt and blouse combo with a pair of flats. What do you want?"

"Uh..." you started.
141111112111.title: To the reception hall

1411111121112.content:
"Isn't there anything not girly?" you ask.

"No sorry. Your going to have to keep up the act a little longer"

You sigh, exasperated."I'll take the blouse and skirt then" you say, having had enough of dresses for one day.

"Sure, here you go" Rebecca hands you a folded pile of a short black skirt, a white floral blouse, a pair of black pantyhose and on top a pair of black ballet flats. "You can change in the cubical, they seem big enough."

You thank her for the clothes and head into a cubical that is indeed quite spacious. You start by shimming out of your dress, neatly folding it when you are done and then climb out of your heels. You sigh in relief when you feet leave them. You keep on the bra, thinking it will add to the disguise and then button up your blouse. Next comes the pantyhose which you roll up your legs, slightly enjoying the clingy feeling of them. You then work the skirt up and around your waist, slightly concerned at its shortness and then step into your ballet flats.

You exit the cubicle and put your dress and heels into a bag. Rebecca then emerges from another cubicle wearing a smart pair of pants and a blouse.

"Hey, I thought you said you didn't have anything less girly than a skirt or dress." you say, annoyed.

"Well, I had to wear something and I don't fancy wearing a dress right now after spending a whole day in one. Anyway, you look cute in that."

"Gee thanks, thats just what I wanted." you say very sarcastically.

"Oh come on. Try to make the most of it. You are only doing it for the reception and then its back to normal. Have a bit of fun, let loose." She says trying to reassure you.

You take a deep breathe to calm down. "Your right, its just for tonight I need to relax a little."

"Thats the spirit" she says and links your arm and practically drags you from the toilet to the hall. You both take a seat at a table putting your bags under it.

You loosen up as the night progresses, enjoying the atmosphere. The best man's speech is particularly funny and the dinner is delicious. After dinner, music begins to play and the newly weds have their first dance and after that, others join the floor. You sit and watch with Rebecca, clapping and laughing, just generally having a good time. You have completely forgotten you are wearing girls clothes and that to the rest of the world you look like one so when two boys around your age in smart suits approach you and Rebecca you are taken back slightly.

"Hi, I'm Max and this is Ben." The lead boy says as he stops in front of you both. He is very tall, around 6ft 3 and also handsome. "We were wondering if you two would like to dance with us."

Rebecca giggles at this and looks to you.

"Erm I don't thi...." you start but Rebecca interrupts you.

"...Think there is reason why we shouldn't, right Keira?" She says, kicking you under the table. "We would love to".

"Great" Max says looking relived. Ben takes Rebecca's hand, helping her up from her chair and guides her to the floor. She looks back and mouths "don't ruin this" to you. Max then offers his hand to you now. Do you take it and dance or not?
1411111121112.title: Skirt/Blouse Combo with Flats

14111111211121.content:
Not seeing any other way out the situation without exposing yourself or hurting his feelings, you take Max's hand and allow yourself to be helped out of your chair. He smiles at you and you blush trying not to make eye contact. Rachel and Rebecca owe you big for this.

Still holding your hand. Max leads you out to the dance floor then turns to face you.

"May I?" He asks grinning.

"Erm, sure" Knowing he means you letting him take the lead. He takes your hand again and wraps his other around your waist. You jump slightly as he does this. You look to the other females dancing and imitate them by putting your hand on his shoulder.

He starts moving and swaying and you are away. You have no difficulty keeping up as Max leads well and allows for your inexperience. You have major trouble looking into Max's face but looking around isn't fun either. You pass your mom and your aunt Susan who are also dancing and they both give you an odd, knowing look making you even more self conscious.

After about twenty minutes of dancing you calm down a little and relax into Max's arms around you. Max notices this and sees it as an encouragement and dances closer to you, so close that you can feel his warmth. Not sure how to respond you move closer too. The music changes to a slow dance and Max dances slower now with more intimacy and purpose in his swaying. To your amazement, you find you are enjoying yourself. The music, the way you can relax not worrying about leading your partner and even just the closeness of another, even if it is another guy. Feeling more and more secure in Max's arms you follow Rebecca's advice and let go, matching Max's intimacy, looking into his eyes and not withdrawing when he presses his body against yours.


You lose track of time, dancing and swaying so when you look up from nuzzling Max's shoulder and see the dance floor is empty aside from you two, you blush heavily and glance around at those seated. Rebecca is sat with Ben at a table, talking, Rachel with her new husband but your mom and aunt Susan have their eyes fixed on you. Aunt Susan has a smirk on her face while your mom has a look of concern. How are you going to explain this?

Suddenly the music comes to an end and Max stops. You look up at him and see unmistakable affection in his eyes, he is smitten with you.

"That was amazing Keira" he says still embraced with you. "I have to go now but I really hope we can see each other again." He releases you and rummages in his pocket producing a napkin and a pen. "Here is my number, please call me, maybe we could hang out or something." he hands you his number. "Bye" he says turning to leave.

"Bye" you say breathlessly. You watch him walk away, confused at just what happened but are soon brought back to reality as you realize you stood alone on the dance floor. You turn and trudge towards Rebecca who is waving off Ben who also appears to be leaving. You slump in the chair next to her and she immediately starts talking to you.

"So, what happened? Spill" she says eagerly.

"Nothing, you made me dance and we danced." you say defensively.

"Oh I think more than that happened, I think you enjoyed it, I think you enjoyed Max" she says giggling.

"Knock it off, I just did what you said and relaxed so it would go easier."

"Yeah but I didn't tell you to snuggle close to him or dance with him for two hours straight."

"Really two hours" you mumble to yourself. "Erm I mean, the more time up there the less time we would spend talking so less chance of me being found out."

Rebecca doesn't look convinced. "Sure, thats why you did it" she says sarcastically "So did Max give you his number or not?" she asks slyly.

"He may have done"

"Ha I knew it, are you going to call him?"

"What? No of course not, I'm not gay, I was just doing it to keep up appearances." you don't even convince yourself with that.

"Uh-huh sure, what ever you say Keira."

The rest of the night goes past pretty uneventfully. Rebecca continues to mock you and make you question your motives but thats really it. The bride and groom leave with Rachel being carried to the exit. Before she leaves though she gives you a cheeky wink. When it all finishes, you reluctantly join your mom and aunt Susan and take a car home with them and Rebecca. To your surprise your mom doesn't talk about your dance almost as if she is acting like it didn't happen. Your aunt Susan stays at your place for the night with Rebecca too. Rebecca shares your room taking your bed with you on a camp bed. She helps you remove your makeup and then you both go to bed. Being too tired to get changed, you sleep in your bra and panties and are soon away with your dreams
14111111211121.title: Dance

choices: You can't change back just yet
141111112111211.content:
You wake up in the morning and scratch your face, which reminds you that you have polished, manicured nails. You shoot awake and look around, seeing Rebecca asleep on your bed. You walk into the bathroom and look in the mirror, seeing your messy blonde extensions, and your matching bra and panties. You sigh and brush your teeth, as you pull your hair back with a scrunchie you found on the counter. You walk back into your room to see Rebecca waking up.

"Hey, cuz." she said.

"Hey. When do you think I can get this stuff off?" you asked.

"Not sure. I think you need to go to a salon to get the extensions removed, and I'm not sure about the nails." she replied. "Here, put on a shirt."

She tossed one of your shirts out of a drawer at you and you put it on. You sighed and the two of you walked downstairs, to see your mother and aunt sitting at the kitchen table, eating breakfast.

"Nice of you girls to wake up." Aunt Susan joked.

"When do I get to get rid of the extensions?" you asked.

"About that..." your mother started.
141111112111211.title: Next Morning

1411111121112111.content:
"What? Why not?" you demanded.

"We had a nice conversation with Max and Ben's mother last night. They're Peter's best man's cousins." your mother started. Peter was Rachel's fiance. "They're staying in town for a few days to help Peter's dad since Peter will be away for the honeymoon..."

"And?" you asked.

“Oh, you’ve turned out so beautifully! Well dear, I have good news: our boss has been able to fulfill your special request as well. So let’s do some mental adjustments and...”
1523111112.title: The woman returns

choices: You try to look around and figure out where you are
15231111121.content:
Even if you could speak, you wouldn’t have the chance. The woman quickly pulls a part of the seat over your head as a sort of helmet, and suddenly you are berated with noise. So much so that you don’t even really process what she said beforehand.

You enjoy mooing when you’re happy. You enjoy mooing when you’re sad. You enjoy mooing when you’re angry. You use mooing to express how you feel. Sometimes, mooing is better than words.

Such statements don’t make any sense, but they continue to bounce around, repeated over and over again in an endless mantra. They etch themselves deeper and deeper into your brain, taking root.

You like to munch on grass sometimes. Grass is tasty. It’s a nice snack. Eating grass is fun. It tastes so much better than icky meat. You’d never eat meat. You’re a herbivore, after all.

If you could move, you’d try to pry the dome off your head. Instead, your mind is filled with thoughts of lovely greens, with grass at the forefront of your mind. You can practically taste it on your lips-

There is no need to think too hard or worry about human life. It will be taken care of. You can just relax. You are a lovely cow girl.

A lovely, lovely cow girl with no need to think. Your brain feels lighter.

You love getting milked. It makes you feel all nice inside. You want to eat lots of grass and greens so you can produce lots of tasty milk.

It feels like your brain has been soaked in milk. You’re struggling to think of anything but the words echoing inside your head. What else is there to focus on?

You are a beautiful bovine lady. Your name is Bess, but you like being called Bessie. You just love the idea of having a blue ribbon in your tail and another one around your neck with a big cowbell attached. You love the sound of the cowbell. It makes you feel safe and happy. You are a happy cow girl named Bessie.

Finally, the talking ends, and yet it still feels as if the words are continually echoing in your head. In the distance, you can vaguely hear someone saying, “Hm, I think that was a bit more animalistic than it was meant to be...oh well, I’m sure she won’t mind. She’s going to love how she’s turned out...”

The voice fades away, and your consciousness does with it.

—-

You blearily open your eyes to a light shining down from above. Blinking to try and clear your vision, you give an annoyed “moo,” which quickly brings you snapping back to reality as you realize what you just said.

Glancing around, you find yourself sitting in...a barn? You clumsily clamber to your feet, struggling to maintain balance with your new hooves.

You manage to stabilize yourself on the side wall of the stable you’re in before looking around. The last thing you remember was the spa, and the weird messages that had been played for you. Then there was just a blank spot of memory. How had you ended up here?

You said bye to your parents, and you locked the door behind you. You were 16 years old, your parents were going on vacation for the next 6 weeks. You would spend most of the summer with your sister, who was 21. You loved making fun of her, and playing practical jokes on her. But little did you know, that was all about to change. She called you to her room, she said that she had an early birthday present for you. Your birthday was only a week or two away, so you gleefully accepted. When you went to her room, she wasn't there. There was just her recliner in the middle of the room. You stepped inside, maybe your gift was on the chair. Suddenly, you felt something hit you from behind. It was your sister! You were on the ground, and she managed to put a blindfold over your face. Confused, she managed to get you tied to the recliner. "Let me go!" You scream. She didn't say anything. You felt her take your shirt off. You felt a lot of things done to you, and felt her put some kind of clothes on you. They dug into your back and shoulders. She took the blindfold off, and flash! She snapped picture after picture. You had no idea what she was doing. She went to her computer, then came back. She printed one out and showed you. "What the hell!" You screamed. "What are you doing?". She had managed to put her clothes on you, a red bra and a shirt that didn't even cover your stomach.

She finally spoke "That's what you get for all the years of your practical jokes and bothering me!", she smiled as she spoke.

"Great, now untie me so I can take all this crap off" You told her. She did, and you put your own clothes back on. Done with that mess, you left her room.

"Wait" She called you back. "You think I'll let you go that easily?

"What do you mean..." You ask nervously.

"Well, let me explain" She started. "I took a lot of photos of you wearing my bra and crop top. You looked so cute! I'm SURE everyone would love to see if I posted it on the internet, I could even send it to your friends, and all the girls at your school! But I'm a nice sister. I won't do that, as long as you follow my simple instructions. All you have to do is live the next 6 weeks like I tell you to, and the picture disappears. And before you try to delete it, I already backed up the photos and protected them with a password."

"Okay...what do you have in mind?"

"Funny you should ask. The rules are simple. You're going to live the summer as my SISTER! I'll even give you some choice to it, but that's it, plain and simple. What do you say, be my sis for a while, or post the photo online?"

You couldn't imagine that all the work you had done this morning was all that impressive, but hearing Jeff say it, made it sound pretty important.

You arrived at the restaurant and Jeff parked the car, walking you inside. It was a pretty upscale establishment, a place one might take a date or a business client if they were trying to impress them. Jeff walked up to the maître d.

"Table for two, under Hoffman." he said.

"Ah, right this way sir." the maître d said, leading you and Jeff to a table. You and Jeff sat down and you started perusing the menu.
154311111111111111111111.title: Going out with Jeff

1543111111111111111111111.content:
The restaurant was pretty nice, far from just some tiny to-go restaurant. You were honestly quite impressed by it, enjoying the atmosphere of the place. Frankly, the fact that Jeff has asked you...made you blush quite a bit honestly. It made you feel really good.

Eventually, a waitress came by, introducing herself and asking you both if you wanted to start with something.

"Probably not the best time for a drink," Jeff chuckled a bit. "Um...I'll just get a Diet Coke please."

"Same here," you replied back, with the waitress writing them both down.

Neither of you felt like an appetizer, given that it was only lunch, so you both stopped at that. Jeff chuckled again at the fact that lunch probably wasn't the best time for wine or anything.

"If this was dinner, I probably would have done that," he smiled.

"Um....same here," you laughed a bit, trying to fit in a bit better.

At that moment though, your chest tingled a bit, almost like it was trying to tell you something. Your breasts were full and perky right now, though they felt kind of rough against the shirt you were wearing.

"I got to use the bathroom quickly," you said as you got up.

"No problem," Jeff replied.

With that, you left to go quickly use the bathroom, though you didn't need a toilet or anything. You didn't even notice that you walked straight into the women's room, as if it didn't matter. It was deserted inside, which made it perfect for this. Looking at yourself in the mirror, you could see yourself. Your face was still the same, but you had long hair pulled in a bun. Were those earrings as well? It looked like there were as you felt them in your ears a bit.

In any case though, you pulled the blazer off before unbuttoning the shirt, showing off your perky breasts. Oddly, you didn't panic at them, just casually pulling the bra out of the purse you brought. One after the other, you pressed your breasts to each cup before sliding each strap over your shoulders, feeling them pull your breasts up. Eventually, you were able to tie them in the back, perfectly settling them before putting the shirt and blazer back on. There, your breasts felt perfectly snug, poking out slightly from inside the shirt.

"Huh...I guess this is okay," you smiled as you took your leave.

You got back to the table, just as drinks were coming. You had already settled on something before leaving, getting a chicken salad while Jeff got something rather light as well. All in all, things were moving quickly.

"So...this place is pretty fancy," you smiled a bit. "Not the kind of place for casual time usually."

"Yeah, you're right," Jeff said before sighing a bit. "There is a bit more to say, other than how much your work has been excellent."

"Oh? What was this about?
1543111111111111111111111.title: Ordering lunch

15431111111111111111111111.content:
"There's been some talk with the higher ups about possibly transferring me to another branch." Jeff started.

You felt a twinge of sadness at that, though you weren't sure why.

"And you can have time to think about this, I'm just bringing it up now so I don't spring it on you when the details are finalized, but, if I was transferred, would you be willing to go with me?" he asked.

"What?" you replied.

"You're invaluable to me not only as a secretary but as a person and I would hate to leave you behind." Jeff said.

"..." you had no words. You couldn't leave, you weren't even a secretary, but somehow, you felt like you would miss Jeff.

"If you don't want to it's fine, and you'll be indispensable to someone else. Hell, half the executives have asked me what I'd take to let them have you as their secretary." Jeff chuckled.

You mused on it. On the one hand, you didn't want to move, you had a life here, your mother, your school, but on the other hand, Jeff needs you...
15431111111111111111111111.title: Jeff has a big question

154311111111111111111111111.content:
Honestly, you felt your heart racing so much, like it was going to jump out of your chest. Your face was probably red at this point as well. What does someone say to something like that?

You remembered everything you had before....and yet things with Jeff felt so much more important. It was like he was becoming a larger fixture in your life, more than anyone else in your life. He needed you...and you beginning to feel like you needed him...

"I....I'll come with you..." you said slowly...but your smile grew at the same time. "I'll join you."

Jeff immediately smiled largely at that, like he was going to burst in joy. Still, he kept it professional, but his smile couldn't be denied.

"Fantastic," Jeff smiled. "I can't tell you how happy I am to hear that."

At that, both of your meals came, much to your delight. Honestly, it felt like things were getting better. Jeff was happy...and you were feeling happy too. So much that you didn't even feel your butt beginning to expand, slowly cushioning you a bit as you ate. Before too long, your butt was big enough to compliment your large hips, forming a perfect heart shape underneath the skirt.

"So...what other details are there?" you asked as you ate. "Like...where are we moving and all that?"
154311111111111111111111111.title: Your answer?

1543111111111111111111111111.content:
"It's a new branch in L.A." Jeff started. "From what I've heard it's beautiful. Every office has a gorgeous view."

"When will we be going?" you asked.

"Not for a few weeks at least. They have to finalize stuff there, and square things away here." Jeff said.

"Wow... I'll have to find a place and all that." you said.

"I know, moving is a little daunting, but it'll be worth it. They even said that we'd both get raises when we transfer." Jeff said.

You finished your meals and the check arrived. You opened your purse, seeing that some makeup and a compact mirror had appeared in it, but Jeff reached out his hand and picked up the check.

"It's on me." Jeff said.

You smiled as Jeff handed the check to the waitress. He's such a gentleman. She returned and you gathered your things and left the restaurant, returning to Jeff's car.

On the way back you opened up your purse and started inspecting the makeup. You dabbed some blush on your face, absentmindedly applying it expertly. You followed that by doing the same with mascara and lipstick. You checked your face in the compact mirror and smiled. The car ride continued and you and Jeff continued to talk about the transfer. You were so involved didn't notice that your face was reshaping itself, as your nose became smaller and cuter and your lips plumped a little bit. Your eyebrows even became less bushy.

Eventually you returned to the parking lot and you and Jeff walked back into the building, going to the elevator.
1543111111111111111111111111.title: More Details

15431111111111111111111111111.content:
"Well, I really enjoyed my time with you," you smiled, graciously thanking Jeff.

"It was my pleasure," Jeff smiled back. "I only hope we can do it more often."

Honestly, you blushed again at that, but you just smiled more. Jeff was such an interesting man and a true gentleman. You...really couldn't help but like him a lot. You had never felt so attached to someone before.

In any case though, Jeff had to leave to go take care of something, so you waved good bye for now as you casually walked back to the desk. This felt great. Since coming here, you felt a lot better. Actually moving to a new place sounded daunting, but something in you just loved the idea. It was like being able to start something new or something like that.

In any case, you returned to your desk, feeling like you knew it like the back of your hand now. Looking at the mirror once again, you actually smiled. The face of a beautiful and mature woman looked back at you, with perfectly applied make up and everything. With the addition of your hips and butt from earlier, you very much looked the part of a woman now.

"Hello Alex," Belinda smiled as she came over to you. "I just heard everything. You and Jeff going to transfer soon?"

You relayed everything to her, explaining most of the details. She seemed to nod in understanding.

"I'll miss you, but I bet you'll love it," she smiled. "Seriously, you and Jeff belong together...in more ways than one.."

She winked at you at that last statement before she left, leaving you a bit bewildered.

"He and I...together?" you said slowly, not even noticing the slight octave going up in your voice.

Honestly...you couldn't help the feeling. Maybe Belinda was on to something with you two.
15431111111111111111111111111.title: Back at the office

154311111111111111111111111111.content:
Eventually, Jeff returned and went into his office. After a few minutes he buzzed you on the intercom.

"Alex, can you come into my office for a minute?" he asked.

"Of course, sir." you replied and walked into his office.

"I need you to run down to the supply closet and get me a box of pens." he said.

"Oh, I have one here if you need it right now." you said, walking up to his desk and holding out a pen that you had carried with you from your desk.

You handed him the pen and his hand touched yours, and you both lingered. You pulled your hand back and you locked eyes. He smiled, and you smiled back.

"Uh, I'll go get that box though." you said and quickly left the room.

That was so exhilarating. You walked with a spring in your step all the way to the supply closet. You grabbed a box of pens and went back to Jeff's office, knocking before entering.

"Here are your pens, sir." you said, placing the box on the desk.

"Thank you, Alex." Jeff said.

"Glad to help, sir." you said as you walked back towards the door.
154311111111111111111111111111.title: Continuing on

choices: Jeff comes to see you again
1543111111111111111111111111111.content:
Boy...when Jeff's hand touched your own, it was like time had slowed down. Honestly, it felt pretty nice. You smiled as you walked out through the door, heading back to your desk as usual by now.

Boy, this all felt really routine now. It was hard to believe you had just gotten here this morning.

Or....was it only just this morning? As you went through the papers, it almost felt like you had been doing this for quite some time. Was it not just this morning and in fact....years?

"Well.....I do feel like I'm enjoying this," you smiled, just continuing on with work like you were a professional.

As you were doing so though, you couldn't feel your manhood twitch just a bit. It seemed like it was beginning it's own slow descent, though that wouldn't be for a bit. Still, the process was beginning, with the addition of a womb beginning to form inside of you.

Still, you barely even noticed as that started. Your mind was on other things right now.
1543111111111111111111111111111.title: Back to work?

15431111111111111111111111111111.content:
You started to perform your tasks on autopilot. Answering the phone, typing reports, making emails, everything went by fast as you concentrated. In fact, you were so enraptured by what you were doing that you almost didn't notice a familiar woman walk past your desk. Your mother has returned from across town. She went past your desk and right into her cubicle. She doesn't seem to notice that you weren't there, even if your desk was over here, and presumably started doing work as you watched the cubicle for several minutes and she didn't emerge from it again.

You began to think to yourself about how fast everything seemed to progressed today. She probably didn't even know about you and Jeff transferring. You have to tell her. You buzzed Jeff on the intercom.

"Sir, I'm stepping away from my desk for a few minutes, is that okay?" you asked.

"Of course it is." Jeff said.

"Thank you." you said.

You stood up and walked up to your mother's cubicle. You took a deep breath and knocked on the wall of her cubicle.

Your mother turned around and...
15431111111111111111111111111111.title: Your Mom suddenly returns

154311111111111111111111111111111.content:
Right as she turned around, she smiled.

"Oh Alex!" she said as she got up, even giving you a brief hug. "How's your day going?"

You were confused. Was she aware of what has been going on? Somehow, the fact that she didn't panic or anything actually made you feel better. You weren't sure how though. Still...guess there was the news to break.

"Um..it's okay," you said before taking a breath. "I thought....you'd like to know that Jeff and I...are going to be transferring in a few weeks."

Your mom didn't seem overly surprised, though she thought about it for a second before giving you a smile.

"I guess the rumors were true then," she said. "But that's great. You and Jeff have been tied at the hip for years after all."

Years? Somehow it was beginning to feel like that, though you weren't entirely sure. Still, the fact that you had her blessing to actually do this made you smile, giving her a hug back. She happily reciprocated it.

"Plus, I bet it won't be long until Jeff pops you the big question too," she added with a little wink.

You weren't sure what she meant by that, but you blushed a bit all the same, thanking her before turning around to leave. Somehow, it was great seeing your Mom again, although it felt different somehow. Almost more like a dear friend rather than a mother for some reason. It was kind of confusing, but it would surely work out. As you were walking back though, you felt another twinge in your groin.

"Oh, guess I better take a trip to the bathroom," you said as you grabbed your purse from your desk.

Your purse still had the panties in them and chances are that you would be needing them soon.
154311111111111111111111111111111.title: She recognizes you

choices: Timeskip to your last day before the transfer?
1543111111111111111111111111111111.content:
You walked towards the bathroom. You stopped in front of the two restrooms, one labeled for men and the other for women. You pondered for a moment, before a secretary emerged from the women's restroom, dressed quite similar to you.

"That settles it then." you said, walking into the women's restroom and stepping into a stall.

You pulled down your skirt and noticing that the stall didn't have much room for standing, sat down on the toilet. Your manhood had disappeared and been replaced with it's equivalent female counterpart. However, that didn't distress you at all.

You finished your business and stood up, and noticed that your underwear was rather bunched underneath your skirt. You thought to the panties and pulled them out of your purse. You replaced them, pulled up your skirt and walked out of the stall. Instead of putting your old underwear into your purse, you walked over to the garbage can and dropped them in.

You walked to the sink and washed your hands, looking at yourself in the mirror. You touched up your makeup a bit and walked back to your desk, your wardrobe completely transformed.
1543111111111111111111111111111111.title: Bathroom Break

15431111111111111111111111111111111.content:
****A Month Later****

One month had passed since the day you arrived at the office here with your mom. Surprisingly, things had gone very smoothly.

You were an expert at your job, like you could do it better than anyone else. It had given you a large sense of pride, making you feel passionate towards this work. Once work had ended, it had been quite an adjustment.

Obviously you didn't live with your mom anymore. You had an apartment all to yourself, full of naturally woman clothes and everything else that was needed. You had taken to it all pretty well. Even after someone happened to call you "Alexandra", it felt pretty natural.

Funny enough, it did feel like blanks were getting filled in, as if you had been at this job for years. That stuff was still kind of confusing, but you just rolled with it. You had an answer for everything after all.

"Good morning Jeff," you smiled as you had entered his office upon your arrival, bringing coffee for the both of you. "I brought you one."

"Ah perfect," Jeff smiled, accepting the drink. "I can always count on you."

"Certainly sir," you smiled, taking a seat yourself as Jeff let you.

It felt like you had especially bonded with Jeff over the month. Granted, you bonded with everyone, like Belinda and Melissa, despite your upcoming transfer. Still, Jeff seemed to really stand out, but you liked that about him.

"Can't believe this is the last day," you said.
15431111111111111111111111111111111.title: Timeskip to your last day before the transfer?

154311111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"I know." Jeff said. "It feels like it was yesterday that they offered it to me. And now we're actually going."

"I still have to pack... and find an apartment. I had one set up in L.A., but it fell through last night." you said.

"Actually, I wanted to ask about that. Alex, we've known each other a while, right?" Jeff asked, taking your hand and placing it in his.

"Of course." you said, smiling.

"And we've also been together a lot outside of work, right?"

You thought back to a week or so, when you had gone out for drinks with Jeff and the other executives, and you ended up staying the night at Jeff's, since you weren't in any position to drive. Nothing had happened, but knowing that he was in the apartment with you had made you feel better.

"Yeah." you said.

"What I'm trying to say, is... I was wondering if when we moved to L.A... you wanted to move in with me?" Jeff asked.

"Oh... I... I... I'd love to." you said, your heart fluttering at the thought of living with Jeff and seeing him all the time.

"I had hoped you'd say yes." Jeff said.

You and Jeff gazed into each other's eyes and you started moving closer to him. You closed your eyes and...

Jeff's phone rang. You reached to pick it up.

"Hello?" you asked.

"Alex, is that you?" Belinda replied from the other side.

"Yeah. Do you need Jeff?" you asked.

"Actually I need both of you in the conference room." Belinda replied.

"Alright. We'll be right there." you said, hanging up the phone.

"Belinda says that we're needed in the conference room." you said.

"Let's not keep them waiting." Jeff said.

You and Jeff walked towards the conference room and when you got there Jeff opened the door and the two of you were confronted with...
154311111111111111111111111111111111.title: Conversation

1543111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Surprise!"

Everyone just shouted at you both, like it was a birthday party or something. You had yelped a bit in surprise, before just laughing a bit along with Jeff.

"What is all this?" you smiled.

"A going away party," your mom actually stepped forward, giving you a hug. "You didn't think we would just let you go without a little something right?"

You and Jeff just laughed at that, appreciative of the reception given to you both. Over the past month, you came to love these people like your dearest friends. Even your mom was like a close friend now, one you could always talk to when you needed something.

Not much else needed to be said as the party just went on, everyone taking a little break from working to have a little fun. You chatted happily with the other secretaries, having come to know them inside and out now.

"I'll miss you," Belinda cried a bit, hugging you.

"I'll miss you too," you said back. "You've all been a big help."

Honestly, that time when you had just come here with your mom almost felt like a long memory after this past month. Honestly, some thing were taking their time to get used to, but you were adjusting all the same, becoming a true adult.
1543111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A going away party

15431111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
****A Week Later****

One week and a plane ride later you stood in your and Jeff's new apartment. It had two bedrooms, but there were two closets inside Jeff's room that you had decided it was best to hang all the clothes in there. Plus, that room had the door that led into the master bathroom with the shower. You finished hanging up your clothes, hanging up the blazer that started it all in the front of the closet before turning from the closet and brushing yourself off of the stray cardboard bits from the boxes. Jeff was sitting on his bed, breaking down the last box as you glanced in the mirror, seeing your long nails, made up face and the casual dress you were wearing. From your gorgeous hair down to your pedicured toes, you were a woman.

"Is that everything?" Jeff asked.

"I think so." you replied as you sat next to him, smoothing your dress as you did.

"They'll want us to report first thing in the morning." Jeff said as he massaged his shoulder.

"Are you okay?" you asked.

"Yeah, just all the heavy lifting." Jeff smirked.

"Let me help you with that." you said as you started to massage his shoulders. Just touching him was exhilarating.

Your eyes locked again, just like they had during the last day at the old office. But there was no phone to distract you this time.

You look Jeff deeply in the eyes and take a deep breath and...
15431111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Timeskip to the move?

154311111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Slowly, with no distractions, your eyes closed as your lips met his, sending a chill down your spine.

This was the absolute best feeling you had felt in the last month, that electric feeling of a kiss. Almost immediately, your arms snaked around Jeff's neck while his own hands went to your small waist. It didn't matter. Being this close to him made you feel great. It felt like it made everything over the past month worth it.

"I've...been waiting to do that..." Jeff smiled between kisses.

"Me too..." you smiled back, returning said kisses.

Before long, Jeff fell backwards on to the bed, pulling you down along with him as you continued to kiss each other deeply. Ah, this was the life. This was a life you could get behind.

"I'm really glad I brought you along," Jeff said as he turned, allowing you to lay on the bed as well. "I wasn't sure what would happen."

"Neither did I," you smiled, looking at him longingly. "But it did, and I love it."

With that, you both began to share some more kisses. You had the rest of the day to yourselves after all. You were a woman now, and you could enjoy everything that came with it.
154311111111111111111111111111111111111.title: You kiss him

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Truth be told, you spent most of the day in Jeff's bed, or rather the bed that you shared, as you had both decided, in between kissing sessions, that it didn't make sense for you to use the other room if all your clothes and accessories were in Jeff's.

The next day you woke up bright and early to get ready, letting Jeff sleep in a little as you went to the bathroom to shower and get ready. You walked out, in only your bra and panties when you were done with your hair still wrapped in a towel. Jeff sat up in bed as you walked out.

"Good morning, my love." he said. You loved it when he said stuff like that.

"Are you ready?" you asked as you starting getting dressed, putting on a black dress with a gray blazer over it, in contrast to the skirt and blouse you had worn on your first day at the old office.

"As long as you're by my side, I'm ready for anything." Jeff said.

You ran over to give him a hug and a good morning kiss and he reciprocated it, before going to the bathroom to get ready himself.

You did your hair and makeup and when Jeff walked out to get his suit on, you were putting on your heels.

"You look gorgeous." Jeff said.

"And you look handsome." you replied. "Though you'll look even better behind your new desk."

"I'm sure the same can be said for you." Jeff quickly quipped.

This new branch was going to be the start of something wonderful.
1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Later on

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
After getting ready, you and Jeff got to drive to your new office.

Honestly, the building wasn't too different on the outside, but there was definitely a different air on the inside. Still, it felt like a nice place, and it was even nicer when you could actually get a great view of the sun and landscape through the window.

It didn't take too long to get used to your new secretary desk. Honestly, after that first day, you loved getting to work at a desk all the time. Unlike when you started, you actually had a name on the desk, showing "Alexandra Thompson".

Getting the computer and everything all set up didn't take too long at all. The only real thing that took adjusting too was how Jeff's role here was different than his old one. Still, you would be there in support as you always were.

"Excuse me?"

You piped up to hear a woman talking to you. She seemed rather nice, with her dark hair. She looked a bit older than you did, though she still looked great.

"Hello. You must be the new transfers," she smiled before offering her hand for a handshake. "I'm Mandy Jacobs."

"Alexandra," you smiled back, accepting her handshake.
1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Later that day

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"You're with the new boss, huh?" she asked.

"Yep." you replied. "We're a package deal."

"Probably good for helping to get acclimated if he has someone familiar around." Mandy said.

"Good for me too. I almost feel as if I'd have been lost without him if I stayed behind." you said.

"I know the feeling. I'd probably be lost without my secretary." Mandy said.

"Oh, so you're one of the executives." you said.

"I am. Not quite as high up as Mr. Hoffman but still up there." she said. "Listen, I know how hard it can be to pack up and start over. I usually treat some of the secretaries to lunch once a week. We're going out today, do you want to join us? It might be a good chance to get to know some of your new co-workers."

You pondered a moment on your answer.
1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Getting to know eachother

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Honestly, it sounded like a lot of fun. Getting to know the women of your workplace.

"Absolutely," you smiled.

"Excellent," Manda smiled, giving you a little pat on the shoulder. "We'll meet down in the lobby on the bottom floor at noon. See you then."

You waved good bye with a smile as she left. Of course, you did get official permission from Jeff a little bit later, but you knew he would agree, especially with another sweet kiss from you. Oh, you could never get tired of those...

But yeah, he was all for you getting to know your new co-workers, so everything was in order. From there on, you just spent time getting further adjusted to your work place, making new reports and e-mails and such. Honestly, you were a fast learner, getting acclimated very quickly.
