You can say one thing for sure, you didn't expect what was waiting behind the door. The door opens and...
1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Adjusting to the Job III: Adjusting to the Dorm

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Boy, it was funny actually being a high school graduate. There were certainly no shortage of expectations of you, especially with your mom and dad being such successful people. Even your sister, Erin, was excelling in school right now. Not to mention how proud your parents even were of that Chouko Sugihara girl that was almost like a second daughter to your parents.

Honestly, you were never sure how you felt about that. In a way, you felt like you could have ribbed that girl a bit more. It felt kind of strange, but you had this feeling that you had more than your fair share of jabs at Erin's Japanese friend, kind of like as if she was another sibling of yours. Sounded kind of ridiculous but oh well.

In any case, being at college now felt like something completely different, especially being in a dorm. You could only wonder how Erin and your parents would be like. House would feel a bit emptier now. Still, you were excited to see what it would be like.

Though...the last thing you expected was seeing a young woman, likely around 19 or so as you were, getting some things out of a box. She had fair skin with nice brunette hair. Honestly, she was kind of pretty in a down to earth sort of way. From her expression, you could tell that she was just as surprised as you were.

"Um....hi.." you said slowly.

"Hi..." she said, blushing a bit. "S-Sorry, I didn't expect that my roommate was a boy."

"Well, I didn't expect a girl either," you chuckled a bit, getting over the initial surprise. "But in any case, it's nice to meet you. I'm Damon Hoffman."

"I'm Briana Forest," she smiled, accepting the handshake you offered. "Nice to meet you."

With the greetings shared, you got a bit of a look around the dorm. It was fairly nice, with two small bedrooms for you both so you didn't have to worry about bunking in the same room with a girl. The lobby was a decent enough size, as was a spot that could serve as a dining room. Overall, it was small yet cozy.

And you would definitely get well acquainted with it.
1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A young woman, around your age, is standing there

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
To start, you carried your bags into your bedroom, which was bare, but that would change soon. You made a few trips back to the car to get various things that you had brought aside from clothes, posters, mostly of movies that you liked, a video game console, school supplies, naturally. You started settling into your room, unpacked your clothes and put them into the dresser in the room, and you decided to relax in your room for a while. Eventually, you got bored and decided to go into the common area, where you could see Briana setting up her room with various posters of pop stars and bands. You noticed that she had put her hair up in a ponytail and she seemed to be struggling. She looks up from hanging a poster and sees you.

"Damon! Can you give me a hand with this?" she asked.

"No prob." you said and walked into her room.

"Just hold up that corner while I get tape." she said.

You complied and she taped up the corner. You looked at the poster and chuckled.

"What's so funny?" she asked.

"My sister likes this band." you replied.

"They're a good band." she retorted.

"Hey, I don't judge." you defended. "I've heard a few of the songs that my sis likes, they're not the worst."

"Thanks." she said.

"Have you been on campus long?" you asked.

"No, I only got here a few hours before you did." she replied.

Your stomach began rumbling.

"I think I'm gonna take a walk to the dining hall, wanna join me?" you asked.

"I could go for something to eat." she replied.

You locked up the room and headed for the dining hall.
1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Getting acquainted with the dorm

1543111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The Dining Hall was thankfully in the building you were in, on the lowest level. Taking one of the elevators, you and Briana took the easy way down.

"I can only wonder what the food here is like," you said.

"I hear it's pretty good for dorm standards," Briana smiled, even giggling just a bit.

You could only hope so, especially if you were going to pretty much live here for a while. In any case, the elevator ride didn't last very long, and you and Briana walked out on the first floor, taking a right to head into the decently sized Dining Hall. It had been a while since you had lunch earlier, so you were pretty famished. Thankfully, the place seemed to have a pretty decent variety, along with the typical burgers and such. You got one of those, while Briana got some pasta.

"Over here's good," you pointed to a table. It wasn't really busy so you didn't have to try and find a table.

"Good for me," Briana nodded as you both sat down.

154312.title: Something else

1543121.content:
It was a normal day in high school and you, a freshman sitting in your first period class, were bored out of your mind. Your teacher was absent, and it seems that no substitute was sent, as it's been a half hour and the teacher's desk is empty. You look around at your classmates, who are all just sitting around talking as they wait. You decide it might be a fun lark to sit down at the teacher's desk, and so you leave your bag at your desk and walk up to the front of the room. You sit down in the teacher's desk and look out over the class. It's an interesting feeling, seeing everyone in front of you like that. Even more bizarre is that the talking died down slowly after you sat there, and everyone looked at you with attention.

"Uh, what's going on?" you asked.

"Nothing, we were just talking before you showed up." one of the students, a boy, replied.

"Huh?" you asked.

"Our normal teacher keeps the attendance roster in the top left drawer of her desk." another student, a girl, said.

It clicked in your mind. They were playing along with the lark! You were the teacher! You chuckled a bit and walked over to the desk to retrieve the roster.

"All right, everyone, I'm the substitute teacher and I'm gonna take attendance!" you said. The class sat there silently.

You started to read off names, getting raised hands and replies of "Here!" or "Present!" You got to your own name, and no one responded, naturally. You went to mark it absent, before catching yourself.

By the time you finished, class was over and the bell rang. Your classmates gathered up their things and started to leave the class. You went to follow them, but something called you back to the desk. Maybe you'd sit there until the substitute showed up, no reason to leave these classes unattended. You retrieved the second period roster from the desk and sat back down at the desk, brushing a loose strand of hair from your face.

It's not like other haven't done it when a substitute was coming. Even weirder though was how you were just sitting here. Wouldn't you possibly end up in trouble from your teachers in your next period?

"Well.....I'm helping out right?" you said to yourself, scratching your head a bit.

I mean, you did help the class out. English was a topic you were pretty good in anyway, so going over basics and such with the class today wasn't too bad. Maybe they wouldn't be too hard on you if you were just helping out. That thought gave you a bit of comfort, though you still kind of felt weird from the whole thing. You thought you would be more worried about doing this, but something made you feel oddly a bit better about it.

You saw your reflection in the desk just a bit, seeing your normal appearance with blue eyes and blonde hair and all. Granted, little strands of hair that were longer than before were there, definitely making your hair a bit bushier than usual. It was even covering your ears just a bit. Perhaps it had been a while since your last haircut.

Anyway, as you were thinking, the next batch of students seemed to be filing in, all jabbering away.

"Do we have a substitute today?" one boy asked.

"I guess so," another replied.

Guess they were referring to you. Kind of odd how they kind of seemed to accept you being a substitute. Boy, this was going to require a lot of explaining when the school found out what you were doing.

It felt really good to help. This must be why teachers do their job, it feels exhilarating! Well, that and summers off.

It also meant you got the house to yourself, save for your parents. That Friday, you were setting up your room for a horror movie marathon, when Caroline came into the room and grabbed a bottle of soda, opening it.

"Hey! Get outta here! That's mine!" you shouted.

"Okay!" Caroline said and ran out.

"That was weird..." you said picking the bottle up and taking a swig of it. After a few minutes, you felt a bit tired and lay down in your bed. The last thing you saw was your ceiling fan spinning as you fell into unconsciousness...

154333.title: Something else

choices: “You are going to take her place”
“I’ve been saving something just in case”
1543331.content:
Tomorrow night was Prom night and your twin sister Emily couldn’t be more excited. She had just turned 18 and had snagged the star captain of the basketball team as her date.

While technically twins, you felt like your sister and you had nothing in common anymore. You were a typical nerdy 18 year old guy. You loved video games, movies, computers, etc.

Your sister had turned into a total varsity cheerleader peppy “cool” girl. You hated it, growing up she was always a shy and nerdy girl you liked the same things as you. The two of you played together all the time as kids and were really close. You loved to pull pranks and jokes on each other all the time, getting more and creative each time. However all that changed as you got older.

Once you two were in middle school Puberty hit your sister like a truck. She developed curves, breasts, her hair turned blonde. Boys started to actually notice her and she soaked up the new attention like a sponge. Once she was in high school she only got sexier focusing more and more on her appearance and reputation. She joined the cheerleading team her freshman year and was now their captain.

You had grown up fairly typical with your close group of friends. Many of them had typical crushes on your sister but she brushed them all aside in favor of typical jocks and athletic guys. She barely even spoke to you now unless she needed something...

You didn’t even plan to go to Prom. You hated these types of shallow dances you wanted a night in with your buddies. However your sister had grown even extra annoying recently. She was obsessed with making sure she looked perfect for the big night. You suspected she was planning to lose her virginity as you found condoms and lube in her purse and she threatened to kill you if you said anything to your parents.

You had finally had enough of this....It was time for some pay back. Your inner child was demanding to remind your sister where she comes from. So you began to plan your prank.

You waited for Emily to go to the bathroom where she was drying her hair and doing her make up. She was going out with her girlfriends tonight and to pick up her prom dress. You grabbed a huge water balloon you had made earlier and a large rubber band normally used to tie down things in truck beds.

With a little skill and effort you latched the rubber band to the door knob and rigged up your trap. As soon as she opened the door she would get a huge water balloon in the face!

Hiding behind your door you watched as Emily opened the door and.......SPLAT! You watched the water balloon launch right at her face hitting her so hard it sent her flying back!

Rushing in to the bathroom you began laughing so hard your sides hurt pointing at her until you saw her face....Apparently your balloon had hit her a little too hard. Blood was rushing down her nose and she had a huge bruise on her face....

“Ethan you bastard! Look at what you did!” Emily cried out in tears as she was crying and furious at you.

Feeling a bit bad you felt like you may have taken this one a bit too far.

“Damn...I’m sorry sis....I just wanted to balloon you. I didn’t think it would hit that hard.” You replied.

“My face! My beautiful face! It’s ruined! What I am going to do now!” Emily said crying out to you.

“Uhhh...I’m sure Derek won’t mind that much....Just use more makeup.” You said a bit sarcastic.

Emily was about to leap at you in anger when you suddenly saw your mother standing there.

“What the hell is going on here?” What did you do?” Your mom Tiffany asked.

“Ethan ruined my face! His stupid prank hit me right in the face!” Emily said crying.

“Hey...:I said sorry! She has been acting super bitchy lately I just wanted to teach her a lesson!” You said trying to defend yourself.

“Hey watch the laungage!” Your Mom said.

“What am I supposed to do my friends are gonna be here soon! If they see me like this I’m ruined!” Emily said crying.

“Hmm....well Ethan since this is your fault I guess it’s uo to you fix this.” Your Mom said.

“What do you expect be to do?” You asked not sure what your mom meant as she looked to you and said.
1543331.title: Reluctant Prom Princess

"What? But I'm a guy!"

"I don't care. Either you take her place, or I'll have to take extreme measures."

You...

154333111.content:
“What are you gonna do? You can’t force me to dress in drag! Tough luck sis!” You said laughing at your mom and sister. What’s the first your mom could do, ground you? That’s nothing. You figured an easy punishment was the very least you could get for spoiling your sisters big day.

“Actually..:.I had something else in mind.” Your Mom said with a grin unlike you had ever seen before. Your sister was smiling to as she seemed to know something you didn’t.

“Oh...you are so screwed...” Emily said laughing.

A few minutes later your mom returned with and old and dusty looking book in her hands. You didn’t recognize it but it looked ancient. Your mom flipped open the book as she found a certain page and looked over to you.

“Ethan sweetie. Did I ever tell you that when I was Pregnant the doctors told me I was supposed to have twin girls? However your father and I agreed if we had twins we wouldn’t have any more kids and he really wanted a boy. Lucky for us my grandmother was well....let’s just say well educated on certain mystical arts. She passed down this book which offered us a way to change your gender before you were born.” Your Mom said with a grin.

“Are...are you serious?” You asked thinking this was all a joke.

“Very serious...mom told me our special heritage years ago. It’s something special that affects only the women in our family.” Emily said with a smile.

“What....what are you gonna do?” You asked nervous.

“Oh that’s simple...I’m just gonna undo the spell...You will become Emily’s twin sister like you were supposed to me.” Your Mom said as she suddenly began to read from the book. It was a weird language you didn’t understand and suddenly the pages of the book began to glow...
154333111.title: Call her bluff.

"Go see your sister, she has some proper clothes for you to wear." Not wanting to argue any more, you obliged. You went to your sisters room to see she had picked out something...

You stared at your mom. There was no way she could actually follow through with that threat, it's ridiculous... but at the same time... you had never seen her as angry as she looked right now. Emily looked pissed too, but you were used to that. She's probably not going to follow through, so what's the harm in playing along with the punishment, right?

"...Fine." you said.

She whispered something into Emily's ear and Emily smiled, leaving the bathroom giggling.

"All right." your mom said. "Get in the shower."

"Why?" you asked.

"Don't question me, just get in the shower. You're to use your sister's shampoo and body wash. And be sure to shave too. Your face, arms, chest, and anywhere else, you hear me?"

"Yes." you said, defeated.

Your mom left the room and you turned on the shower.
154333112.title: Go along reluctantly.

1543331121.content:
You quickly got to work, you figured that your mom would probably put you in a dress, humiliate you in front of Emily to make you feel bad, and your debt would be paid and everything would go on it's way. Maybe Emily would get a picture to save for blackmail or something.

You squeezed out some of the body wash, which was very flowery and fruity smelling, and you absolutely hated it. Not cause it was girly, just cause you didn't like the way it smelled. You lathered yourself up and rinsed off, before moving on to the equally fruity and flowery shampoo. You washed your hair and then got to the shaving, being very careful when shaving your legs. It'll take time to grow back, but at least it'll be over soon.
You finished your shower and turned off the water. As you got out, you noticed that while you were in, your mom or Emily had left a towel and a robe, both pink, and both Emily's, hanging in the bathroom, along with a note that said to put them on. You wrapped the towel around your waist and put on the robe, walking out of the bathroom and towards your room, which was locked, and as you tried the door again, you heard a shout from the other room.

"Ethan! Come into Emily's room!" your mom shouted.

"Coming!" you turned and walked into Emily's room, where Emily was arranging some stuff on her vanity.

"Come here." your mom said as you walked in. "And give me the towel."

You unwrapped the towel from your waist and made sure the robe was totally closed, before handing it to your mom, who draped it over your head before wrapping it like a turban on top of your head. Another indignity...

"Okay, so what do we do, embarrass me a little bit and then we're done?" you asked.

"Embarrass? Of course not. You're just lucky that you and your sister still have identical looking faces." your mom said.

"What are you talking about?" you demanded.

"Isn't it obvious? You ruined my face, so you have to replace it." Emily said. "My friends are going to be here in an hour or so so we can pick up our dresses, after a final fitting to be sure they fit, so you're going to go do it, so that mom and I can figure out if my face is going to be presentable tomorrow."

"They can't just pick it up for you?" you asked.

"They could... but then you'd be getting off scot-free." Emily said.

"Anyway, we have work to do." your mom said, motioning to the chair at Emily's vanity. "Let's get started. Sit down, Ethan."

You sat down in the chair, now fully realizing what that stupid prank had gotten you into.

The makeup is the last part. With it on your face, nobody will tell you're a male.

You nod, and look for your mom, hoping for any last attempts to cancel it. She smiles, and hopes you have a good prom.

1543331121111111.title: Love it!

1543332.content:
It started out innocently. You were walking home from a club, and had been drinking a bit, so you hadn't brought a car, and it was a nice enough night, so you started walking. Your girlfriend, Bella was wearing three-inch purple heels that matched her dress, and you had on a pair of dress shoes. As you walked, she started to complain about her feet, and started stopping every few blocks.

"Come on! We're almost home!" you said.

"My feet hurt! Give me a minute!" Bella complained.

"Should've worn flats." you chuckled. "You knew we were walking home."

She thought for a moment.

"Give me your shoes." she said.

"What?"

"Your shoes. Give them to me. You want me to get home? Walk home in your socks and see how it feels." she said.

You thought for a moment. You were the same shoe size, something that had made it very convenient for Bella to steal your sneakers or a pair of socks on occasion.

"...Fine." you said. You took your shoes off and handed them to her.

She slipped on your shoes and started walking, carrying her heels in, and you followed, having no problem until you realized that the entire block in front of your apartment building was wet.

Bella started walking towards the building as you contemplated your situation.

"What's wrong?" she asked.

"I don't want to walk through the wet sidewalk without my shoes. Trade back? It's only a block left." you replied.

"Hm..." she pondered. She grinned as she tossed her heels at you.

"No way." you said.

"Then find another way around." she started walking towards the building.

It was late, and it was only a block, anyway. You put on the heels and rushed to follow her, finding that even after a minute or so, your feet started to hurt.

"You know," Bella started. "You don't look half bad in those."

You walked across the lobby towards the elevator, with Bella being amused by the clicking of the heels.

"Ow..." you said as you stepped into the elevator. You pulled off the heels. "Not funny."

"You got to experience a fraction of what women experience on a daily basis." Bella said.

"Then they should pick flats." you laughed, and Bella joined in.

After that, you both got ready for bed and went to sleep.

15433331.content: Alright, so how old is this guy?
15433331.title: Girl-hog's Day

154333312.content:
Your alarm buzzed and instinctively, you reached your arm over to hit the snooze button. The clock read: 6:00am You turned over to look over at your girlfriend, who was usually laying next to you, but were instead met with an empty half of the bed. You shook away the drowsiness and sat up, finding a note next to your alarm clock.

"Phil- Got called into work early today, babe. See you later! Rita" the note read.

Rita was a reporter for the local news, so sometimes they'd call her in to cover for an earlier shift or in case there was a major emergency. Not an atypical occurrence, and you felt like this was another normal day. You did not yet know how un-ordinary today would truly be.

You stretched and yawned, before getting out of bed and starting your normal routine. You weren't due in until 8:00, so you didn't have to rush, since you weren't fighting for bathroom time with Rita, who needed a lot more time to get presentable, since she was on camera. You were a cameraman for the news studio, so you weren't called in as often in emergency situations because they had enough camera people to go around.

As you stepped out of bed, you tripped over a pair of heels that Rita had left strewn across the floor. This also happened when she was called in early, since she would get dressed in the dark. You sighed and tossed the pair of heels, black pumps, into the closet, before making your way to the bathroom.

After showering and getting dressed, in your typical outfit, a sweater and jeans, (no one cares what the camera guy wears), you made a quick breakfast, and soon enough, it was time to head out. You picked up your keys and headed out the door to your car...
154333312.title: Adult

1543333121.content:
Work about a decent 15-20 drive. You would have liked to be closer to work, but guess that was how the cookie crumbled at times. You wondered just how early Rita got up all the time. Must be quite something, especially to the point where you often don't notice when she leaves.

At that moment, you heard your cellphone ringing. Glancing at the number, you could tell it was Jason, one of your co-workers and a good friend. Obviously, you wouldn't dare use one of your hands to hold a phone while driving, but thankfully your car had a little compartment for handling that. Your phone was in it at the time, so you just pressed the button.

"Hey Jason. Morning," you said, continuing to drive normally.

"Morning Phil. I see Rita got called in again," Jason said.

"Yeah, I think that's the 3rd time this week," you sighed. "I know she says she doesn't mind but I can tell it must be making her tired. Perhaps we should take it easy one of these days."

"Probably a good idea. She could use a good break!" Jason said with a little laugh. "Anyway, back to the reason I called, I just wanted to say traffic might be a little tight. Probably best to use the other route. Accident earlier today."

"Just great," you sighed.

You had a few options for driving to work, but it was a little annoying when the fastest route got blocked for some reason or another. Oh well, thankfully by this point, you had plenty of alternate routes.

"Okay, thanks for the heads up," you said.

"No problem, man," Jason said. "Just been trying to give a heads up to anyone coming down that way."

With that, he hung up. You made your detour, avoiding most of the accident. It added a few minutes to your time, but thankfully you knew to give yourself enough time. It wasn't too long afterwards that the news building began to show up. You had your own parking space, which was convenient enough, so you parked there as you usually did.

"Okay....hope nothing too strange today," you sighed.

Even being a cameraman required quite a bit of running around at times, plus holding the camera and such. It could make you ache after a while. Oh well, better toughen up!
1543333121.title: On the way to work

15433331211.content:
You walked into the news station to find it bustling as usual, and the director rushing around frantically, slightly usual, but a little unusual in the sense that she was more on edge than usual. You walked past to go clock in, running into Jason as he poured himself a cup of coffee.

"What's eating Denise?" you asked.

"New weather-girl called out. Stomach virus." Jason replied.

"Wow..." you responded. "Where's Rita?"

"Out in the van. Six car pile-up on Glendale Terrace." Jason said.

"Nice..." you said. "What's that, the sixth one this year so far?"

As you chatted a bit, you heard a different voice shouting your name.

"Phil!" Denise shouted.

"Yeah?" you replied.

"I need you on camera 2!" she shouted.

"Got it!" you replied.

You went over to the cameras and set yourself up. You had been doing it long enough that you knew exactly what to do to set it up. The anchors got into position and you noticed that they scrounged up one of the other meteorologists to do the weather report as Denise gave the countdown.

"5...4...3...2..." Denise motioned to start broadcasting.
15433331211.title: Arriving at the news station

154333312111.content:
"Good day everyone. This is Tom Harris here," the male anchor said.

"And I'm Samantha Farmer," the female anchor said.

They were the normal anchors that the studio always had. Pretty good ones too. They were fairly popular for the area. You did your job, holding camera 2 in place. As they began talking about the news of the day, you looked over to the meteorologist. That was Jeff Sanders, who was a good meteorologist in his own right, but the new weather-girl had been really good of late. The ratings went up when she came around. Oh well, guess you couldn't work around illness.

"And now, we go out to Rita Parker, who's live at a 6 car pile-up over at Glendale Terrace," Samantha announced. "Rita, you there?"

"Yes I am Samantha," Rita's voice rang out over the speaker.

You always enjoyed hearing her voice. She did such a good job. You felt like she could go on for greater things within the company. Heck, maybe one of these days you'll find something beyond the camera. You chuckled to yourself at that. As if that would happen.

However, right at that time, there were some blips on your camera screen. You hummed a bit but didn't panic. Technical problems weren't all that rare, so you adjusted the camera slightly. From what you could tell however, the glitching seemed to be happening just about everywhere in the studio.

"What the-" you said.

Right at that, you felt like a small shock went through you. It wasn't anything big, like getting hit with static electricity from someone. It surprised you more than anything else. However, right afterwards, things seemed to be returning to normal. The anchors acknowledged that there was a little technical problem, but proceeded onwards once everything seemed okay.

You just shrugged it off and continued doing your job. It was probably just a tiny glitch that passed through and got taken care of.
154333312111.title: During the first program

1543333121111.content:
The weather report went off mostly without a hitch, though Jeff wasn't nearly as comfortable on screen as the usual girl. He stumbled using the prompter a few times, but otherwise got the report out.

You were lucky that you didn't have to deal with the prompter, you weren't sure you'd be able to keep up. Eventually, the morning news program was over, and you could take a break, until the noontime one, which was well needed, since even though the camera was on a stand, it still took a lot of effort to arrange it and press the buttons.

As you got on break, Rita entered the studio, and you went over to greet her.

"Hey baby, how was it?" Rita asked before you quickly shared a kiss.

"You were great. Bet you anything that you could make anchor one day." you said.

"Oh, come on, it's not that good. It's a normal traffic story." Rita said.

"You can take anything and spin it into gold." you smiled.

Rita beamed as the two of you went to grab something to eat from the break room.
1543333121111.title: To the weather report

15433331211111.content:
The two of you went down the break room, exchanging casual words all the while. You both typically brought a little leftovers from home for lunch. It helped whenever there wasn't a group lunch.

"I could eat a horse after all of that," Rita smiled and laughed a bit.

"Me too after that drive," you chuckled right back. "Maybe one of these days, we could go out. Get out of the apartment for once."

"That'd be nice," Rita nodded.

You both sat down at the table in the break room, finally getting a little peace and quiet from all the hustle and bustle. Jeff was in there as well, microwaving a little something for himself.

"Hello you two," he smiled. "Rough day huh?"

"You could say that," you said. "Weather's been really rough."

"Well, it is the stormy time of year. Can't really help it," Jeff shrugged.

"Still, I kind of wish there would be other things aside from pile-ups," Rita shook her head. "It's nice to get my face on camera but it's always for this kind of stuff."

"Hopefully we'll concoct something more positive for you, right?" Jeff chuckled at you.

"Right," you laughed right back.

Rita have you a playful jab on the shoulder as she laughed herself. From there, the conversation went on into typical normal stuff. Just things you talked about with everyone all the time. Hardly worth noting.
15433331211111.title: Lunch

15433332.content:
You are Tony Edwards. A 22 old working as a mail boy in a large office building downtown.

One day a weird package arrived at your door. You didn’t order it or expect anything to arrive.

Upon opening it you discovered a large full length mirror. It was well made, with ornate engravings etched around it. Something fancy and rather expensive.

You would have taken it somewhere had there not been a note attached.

“Mr. Edwards. Enjoy this gift...May it show you the true beauty that lies within us all.” -Anonymous

You had no idea who would gift you a mirror or why but you couldn’t refuse it. Taking it to your room you set it up nicely as you figured it made a nice and useful decoration.

You went to get ready for the day as you jumped into the shower. After a few minutes you returned to your room to get dressed as you suddenly paused with shock....

In the mirror was not your reflection....Standkng there was the image of a beautiful woman you had never seen before...

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/c5/65/69/...

She moved as you moved. Mimicked your every action. She truly moved as your reflection should.

You first thought you were dreaming, maybe just seeing things. However every other mirror showed your normal reflection. Only this one had the woman inside it.

You had no idea what to do or say. You could call someone or maybe just stay silent?

You had a friend, Max. He was nerdy guy who loved talking about magic stuff and fantasy. Maybe he would know something?

Maybe it was better to ignore it for now? Just stay quiet and see if the reflection goes away?
15433332.title: Altered Reflection

154333321.content:
You quickly grabbed a sheet and covered up the mirror. Whatever sort of sick joke this was, you weren't interested in it, and you figured it was some sort of trick mirror, you didn't understand how it worked, but you didn't want to. And Max would probably think you were crazy too, you certainly thought you were...

"It's probably nothing..." you thought to yourself.

And you didn't think of it for the rest of the morning, that was until lunch, when one of your co-workers, Janet, a secretary that you delivered mail to quite often, since her boss was always ordering stuff, remarked on an odd change in your appearance.

"What happened to your hair? Did you lighten it?" she asked.

"Lighten it... No!" you exclaimed. "Do you have a mirror?"

You grabbed at your hair as Janet dug a compact out of her bag and handed it to you. Sure enough, your hair was indeed half a shade lighter, going from dark black to a dark brown.

"What the fuck?" you asked. "I swear I didn't do that!"

"A few more shades and you'll be blonde!" Janet laughed as it clicked in your head what was probably causing it.

"The mirror!" you shouted.

"Yeah... actually can I have it back?" Janet asked.

"Not that one! Oh yeah..." you handed the mirror back. "A weird mirror was delivered to my door and I looked in it, and I swear I saw a woman staring back."

"Are you sure it wasn't a window or a screen?" Janet asked.

"Yes. And I think it's doing something..." you replied.

After work, you immediately went...
154333321.title: Ignore it for now

choices: “A beautiful woman” Max sees a different woman than you
1543333211.content:
You went home quickly worried by what Janet said. On the way home you noticed you had to brush hair out of eyes several times. Odd since you just had a hair cut last week...

When you got home you looked into the bathroom mirror to confirm your fears. Your had definitely changed. In fact it wasn’t even brown anymore. It had continued to lighten over the day and was now a dirty blonde! It had definitely grown a bit longer too, as several strands got in your way as you kept brushing them aside.

You went back to your room and pulled out the sheet from the mirror. You stared into the mirror as sure enough the reflection of the woman from before stared right back at you...

The only difference you noticed what her outfit had changed. The first time you looked you were just in your underwear so you saw her in lingerie. Now you were there in your work clothes and now she was dressed in a sexy business work outfit. She had on heels with a short skirt and tight blouse. Her movements still mimicked yours in every way.

You decided maybe your friend Max could help. He was a computer wiz and loved reading about magical and fantasy things. Maybe he had heard of this before. You messaged him and he agreed to come over shortly.

After about an hour Max arrived at your place.

“Hey man, so what’s going on? Whoa...when did you change your hair?” He asked.

“Yeah...just...well. It’s hard to explain. Just follow me.” You said taking Max inside.

You brought him into your room as he showed him the mirror.

“Do me a favor. Look into the mirror and tell me what you see.” You asked.

“Are you serious? It looks just like a normal mirror.” Max said.

“Please....just trust me.” You protested.

“Alright...Whatever you say man.” Max said as he walked to the mirror.

“Oh my God!” Max said with a sudden stunned attitude.

“What? What do you see?” You said nervous.

“I see.....
1543333211.title: Over to Max for help

15433332112.content:
"I see... myself. I had no idea I had a zit on my nose!" Max laughed.

"You dick!" you rushed over to him and grabbed him by the lapels of his hoodie.

"Woah! Okay, this I see!" Max exclaimed, looking back at the mirror. "She's hot!"

"So you can see that my reflection is wrong?" you asked.

"Well, obviously!" Max replied. "This is... remarkable!"

Max walked over to the mirror and started examining it.

"You read a lot of fantasy, ever read anything like this?" you asked.

"Magic mirror, yeah. But a mirror that transforms a person... not really. Trick mirrors, but if what happened to your hair is related to this... this is way more intense than that." Max replied.

"Do you have any ideas?" you asked. "I'm kinda freaking out here."

"Well... I've got a few ideas... First off..." Max started.
15433332112.title: “Myself....” Max was being sarcastic

choices: Your hair was now long and blonde
Your hands were now female with long nails
154333321121.content:
“Let me try and figure out something. I will do some research online and get back to you.” Max said as he took out his phone.

Max took several pictures of the mirror making sure to get a good description of it.

“You sure about this? I mean you see how hot she is right? Maybe it wouldn’t be so bad being a woman.” Max said with a grin.

“You can be such an ass sometimes...” You replied.

“Hey...don’t worry I’ll get back to you tomorrow. If you grow boobs tonight make sure to tell me how they feel!” Max said laughing as he left your apartment.

While this might seem like a joke to him, to you this was very much real. You hoped there was a simple solution to this problem as you retired for the night.

You went to bed that night still nervous as you stared at the beautiful reflection in the mirror. As much as you hated to admit it, you had considered what it would be like to be her. Shaking those thoughts out of your head you went to bed anxious for an answer about this thing.

When you woke up the next morning however you were shocked to discover....
154333321121.title: Max suggests researching it

1543333211211.content:
You woke up the next morning and yawned, to find your face being blocked by... hair. Blonde hair! You shot up out of bed and rushed into the bathroom to see that your hair had finished it's transformation, now being completely blonde and down past your shoulders.

You immediately ran to a drawer in the kitchen and grabbed a pair of scissors, rushing back to the bathroom and pulling all the hair together into a ponytail, before slicing it off. You dropped the hair into the garbage and turned back to the bathroom mirror, where you saw the hair immediately grow back.

"Shit!" you shouted.

You looked at your body closely in the bathroom mirror and noticed that all your body hair, eyebrows, arms, legs, armpits, had also become blonde as well.

You rushed out of the bathroom and grabbed your phone, dialing Max... and noticing that your fingernails had grown slightly overnight.

"Max!" you shouted as he picked up the phone.

"Huh? Oh, Tony... Got boobs yet?" he chuckled.

"No! But my hair... it's long and blonde now. And I can't cut it off!" you shouted.

"Interesting... I did some research last night and I did find something similar to your case. Least I think it is, I found some journals from fifty years ago where some dude that went missing claimed that his body was transforming because of a painting he was gifted. Not exactly a mirror but..." Max started.

"Was there anything about who gifted it?"

"No... Just the guy going crazier and crazier until the journals just stopped..."

"Oh god... I'm screwed..."

"Maybe not..." Max said. "The painting still exists... and it's in some old lady's private collection. Maybe she might know something. Why don't we...?"
1543333211211.title: Your hair was now long and blonde

15433332112111.content:
“We should check out the painting, it’s on display at the local art museum here in town.” Max suggested.

“It the best we have it seems.” You said sighing. You couldn’t help but stare at the long golden locks that now framed your face.

A few hours passed and Max came to pick you up.

“Whoa! You weren’t kidding look at that hair!” Max said seeing your new blonde hair.

“Shut it! Can’t you tell how embarrassing this is!” You said as you grabbed a beanie cap and put it on to hide it as best you could.

The two of you drove down to the local art museum and signed up for the tour. Guiding you along the way was an older woman who would stop and discuss each painting.

Most of them while pretty, were nothing special. Until you reached the end of the tour. There you saw an old oil painting.

In the painting was a man staring at a mirror. However his reflection in the mirror was that of a beautiful woman...

“This here is our latest donation. It’s called Vanity. It is supposed to represent how vain desires trap us more each day.” The older woman said.

“It....Uhh...It looks like it’s trying to tell a story. Do you know the history?” You said speaking up.

“I don’t unfortunately. I just know it was donated by an elderly woman shortly before she passed away. She didn’t mention the author by name. However her journals were also given and taken to archives. Our teams hope to use them to gain insight into this fascinating piece. Maybe discover the true artist behind the work.” The older woman said as she kept the tour guide moving.

You paused and looked more at the painting. You noticed the mirror in it and paused as you saw the ornate designs matched the mirror at your place perfectly.

“Do you see this?” You said pointing it out to Max.

“Yeah....Do you think...This was painted by the last person who had this mirror. As a way to tell what happened to them?” Max asked.

“Worse....I think it’s a warning. They tried to tell their story before the mirror took their identity completely.” You said looking deeper into it.

“Uhh...dude...” Max said pausing as he pointed to your hands.

Looking down you saw your fingernails, which had grown l a bit longer this morning were suddenly growing again....

Even worse was they were changing color...They turned the same shade of bright pink you saw earlier in the reflection.

You thought at first the changes were only coming at night while you slept. It seemed they were now picking up speed. Or was this a reaction to your investigation?
15433332112111.title: Check out the painting

choices: Toss the mirror in a dumpster
154333321121111.content:
After leaving the museum, you and Max headed back to your place, you being despondent that you couldn't find the answers you had been seeking. On the way back, you dropped by a drugstore to get nail polish remover, and as you had expected, it did nothing to remove the color. And clipping the nails only made them grow back instantly.

"Listen, if you'd like, I can stick around, to observe." Max said.

"I'd like that." you replied. "Maybe you can tell my story if this takes over my mind."

"Don't talk like that." Max said. "We can figure this out. We just need more information about how it works."

"Forget about how it works, we have to get rid of it!" you shouted, tearing your beanie off. "We know it works when I'm away from it, because of what happened today, but what if we threw it out, or destroyed it?"

"That might be a little hasty, I mean, what if that makes it worse?"

"How can anything be worse than it already is?"

Max debated your point for a moment.

"So what do you want to do?" Max asked.

"I'm going to..." you started.
154333321121111.title: Later that evening

choices: Max discovers new facts about the mirror
1543333211211111.content:
"I'm going to toss this thing into the trash!" you exclaimed.

You had gotten it into your house no problem, so getting it out no problem should be a snap! You went over to the mirror and started dragging it towards the door. As you did, you found that it got heavier with every step.

"Uh..." Max started.

You stopped in your tracks as you realized that your hands and arms were slimming down, and becoming daintier with every inch that the mirror moved.

"No! No! No!" you shouted as you pounded on the side of the mirror with your, now delicately manicured hands.

"Listen, it's all right." Max walked up to you and pulled you away from the mirror. "Maybe stay away from it for right now."

You stared at your reflection, becoming more and more accurate with every attempt you made to reverse the process. How long until your face, chest, legs, and other body parts matched? Max was right.

"Let me take a look at this thing, and you go lay down or something." Max said.

"You're not doing anything without me!"

"There won't be a you left if you keep trying stuff!"

Unfortunately, he was right again.

"Fine..." you reluctantly went into the other room.

As Max looked over the mirror,
1543333211211111.title: Toss the mirror in a dumpster

choices: On the way you start changing more
You make it to the museum no problem
15433332112111111.content:
Hanging out in your room Max investigated the mirror as you sighed looking at yourself. How much longer until you became the woman you saw? Would your mind change too? Would you forget yourself or just be cursed to live the rest of your days in another body? These thoughts consumed your mind as laid back hoping Max could find something useful.

A few minutes later Max returned as he was typing something into his phone.

“What is it?” You asked anxiously sitting up.

“I recognized something on the mirror. A symbol. Do you recognize this?” Max said showing you an odd picture.

The picture was that of an odd looking eye. Some sort of ancient looking symbol or something, but not one that stood out to you.

“Not really, it’s a weird old looking eye.” You replied.

“Exactly... This is carved into the base of the mirror. I’ve seen this symbol before.” Max replied.

“Where?” You asked.

“Remember back in school we took a trip to the museum? I remember seeing this symbol all of the place when we were checking out medieval relics.” Max said.

“So you want to head to the museum and see what we can find?” You replied.

“It’s the best idea I’ve got so far.” Max said.

“I guess we better hurry. I don’t know how much longer I have...” You replied looking at your arms and hands.

The two of hurried and got in Max’s car and drove off together in hopes of finding more clues.
15433332112111111.title: Max discovers new facts about the mirror

choices: The exhibit is closed, you have to sneak in
154333321121111111.content:
As Max drove, you scrolled through your phone, checking for any information that the museum has available on it's website, which was precious little, it was an older exhibit, your visit with school had been several years ago, and it was increasingly frustrating with your nails inhibiting your tapping of the screen.

"What I'd be interested in knowing is why you were targeted. Did you piss off anyone recently?" Max asked.

"Did I piss off anyone who owns a magic mirror that turns men into women? No, I didn't." you remarked sarcastically.

"Just asking." Max defended.

As you impatiently tapped your foot against the area underneath the glove compartment, you felt your foot get farther from the area. You quickly looked down to see your legs shrinking, and your feet started to slide out of the shoes they shrunk as well. You couldn't see your toenails under your socks, but you could only assume that they were the same shade of pink as your fingernails.

"Nooooo!" you whined.

"Probably because we're getting closer to uncovering this." Max remarked. "We're here, let's go."

Max parked and you followed him out, shuffling along as you tried to tie your shoes tighter so they would stay on your feet.

You go to the ticket booth and...
154333321121111111.title: On the way you start changing more

choices: Your shoes and clothes were changing
1543333211211111111.content:
Fortunately for the two of you a local middle school was visiting the museum allowing you both to slip in within raising too much attention.

“I think it’s over here in the medieval history section.” Max stares taking you by the hand and leading you.

At first this act seemed weird and strange but you did feel a strange feeling of comfort as he guided you. When you realized where this thought was headed however you quickly pulled your hand back and shook your head.

“Here it is, the mirror of Prince Adam.” Max said showing you a mirror that looked strangely exactly like the one in your room. However when you looked into it you saw yourself just as you were...There seemed to be nothing special about this mirror at all.

“You see! I know this mirror looked familiar! We must have see this ourselves back when we were kids and just forgotten.” Max said.

“Something is different though. I don’t feel anything strange coming from this mirror, it seems normal.” You replied.

Max saw a book next to the mirror which was labeled. “Ancient Medieval Legends”

Flipping through the book Max found the chapter he was looking for and began to read it aloud.

“The Cursed mirror of Prince Adam. This mirror dates back to medieval Europe and Arthurian Legends. The story behind it states that Prince Adam was the most handsome prince his kingdom had ever seen. He was loved by the people and his best friend was the greatest knight in the land. However Prince Adam was vain and when it came time for him to marry he was Promised to Princess Lilith of a neighboring kingdom. While Princess Lilith was by no means ugly her rather plain appearance was considered beneath the high standards of Prince Adam. He rejected her and humiliated her at what was supposed to be their engagement ceremony. Horrified and filled with rage Princess Lilith went to an old and evil witch and asked her for a way to get revenge on Prince Adam. The witch made a deal with her and gifted her a large mirror and said to give it to Adam. The princess took the mirror and sent it to Adam as a gift. Adam took the mirror without question and used it in his vanity to make sure he always looked his best. However one morning when he awoke he saw not himself in the mirror but the image of a beautiful woman, more beautiful than any he had ever seen. Adam became obsessed with this woman and wanted nothing more than to find her. However no one else, not even his best friend the knight could see her, they simply saw themselves. Soon Adam began to change, his body, his clothes, even his castle began to change. At first Adam resisted and enlisted his best friend to help. However the more he resisted the faster he changed...Piece by Piece Adam saw his life fade away unable to stop it before he too was transformed into the woman he saw in the mirror. Prince Adam was no more and Princess Adaline was born. When Lilith saw what she had done to Adam she was filled with reject. She commissioned a counter curse be created in the form of a ring so she could restore Adam but by the time he was completed it was too late...Princess Adaline has fully given in to her new female desires and had no desire to return, for the ring only worked if the wearer truly wished it too. Princess Adaline then went on to marry her protector and former best friend and the two had many children together. Prince Adam got the happy ending he always wanted just not in the way he expected...”

“Wow...that was chilling and accurate.” You said looking at yourself.

“You think your mirror is the mirror from the story?” Max asked.

“It makes sense...I just don’t understand why. I’ve never been a vain person nor have I rejected anyone like that.” You replied.

“I know...look here. It says this mirror is an authentic reproduction. The original went missing after the Second World War. The ring said to be the original counter curse ring is currently being displayed at the London Museum.” Max said.

“So the only potential lead we have is a ring in another continent?” You said feeling hopeless.

“Hey! Don’t give up just like that? You remember when I broke my leg mountain biking? They said I may never walk right again. You showed up every day for 6 months and forced me to go walking until I healed properly. I’m not willing to give up on you!” Max said confidently.

Max’s words really helped pick up your spirts as you felt a bit better as you nodded. Picking yourself up you weren’t ready to give up yet. However as you got up...
1543333211211111111.title: Finding the exhibit

15433332112111111111.content:
You felt a rippling sensation that forced you to grab onto Max for support. You couldn't see it, but you felt your legs starting to slim down to likely match up with your newly shrunken feet.

"Woah!" you exclaimed as your pants began to slide down, grabbing them just in time as your waist pulled in several sizes.

"It happened again, didn't it?" Max asked.

"Uh huh." you nodded as you held your pants up.

"Try this." Max pulled his belt out from his waist and helped secure it around your waist.

You wanted to refuse his help and put the belt on yourself, but as you learned with your phone, it might be tricky with your new nails. Max pulled it to the smallest hole, but even that was still too loose for your new waist.

"I've got this." Max smiled and pulled it even tighter and shoved the prong through the leather. "There we go."

It was crude, but it would work until you could get home, or get properly sized clothes, which was probably the best scenario. There's a mall not too far from here, and nothing you have at home was going to fit your body as it is.

You and Max started walking out of the museum with new determination, after Max got some contact info from the assistant curator for the London Museum. If their ring was the real deal, it might be the key to saving you, but you didn't want to get your hopes up.

"Thanks." you said to Max as you climbed back into the car.

"Anything for a friend." Max said.

"Just wish you didn't have to ruin your belt for me."

"Eh, it was an old belt anyway."

"So, wanna head back to your place and get in touch with London?" Max asked.

"Actually..." you started.
15433332112111111111.title: Your legs began to change

154333321121111111112.content:
“Please...can we just head home?” You said feeling a bit depressed. At this rate you were never going to make it to London. You would be lucky to still be a male this time tomorrow it seemed.

In the car Max looked back to you seeing you were upset.

“So when are we going to London? We still have our Passports from going to Mexico back in College. I could book us some flights ASAP.” Max replied.

“You think there are going to accept me as I’m looking now? Who knows what I will look like in the morning.” You replied still upset.

“Hey it doesn’t matter what you look like you are still my friend! Even if we have to fake a new passport we will figure something out.” Max said trying to boost your spirits.

Unfortunately things didn’t work out exactly as you had hoped...Getting online Max found that there were no open seats on flights to London on such short notice. The soonest was at least a week out...

“By then I will be long gone...I’ll be this beautiful blonde bombshell...Huge tits and ass...Probably just be some guys eye candy...” You said sighing...

“Never...I will think of something.” Max said going back to his computer.

You stood in front of the mirror wearing just a t shirt and gym shorts now, they were the only things left that fit. The woman in the mirror staring back at you almost seemed to be mocking you with her beauty. Letting you know it was your fate...

There was a sudden knock on the door however as both you and Max looked cautiously. Checking the peephole there was nobody there...

Opening the door slowly you saw nothing...nobody...Looking around you were a bit surprised when you saw an envelope taped to your door.

“This was on the door.” You said opening the envelope.

Inside was a letter, it appeared hand written but not by anybody you recognized. There was also something else. A pair of tickets, two first class plane tickets to London leaving the day after tomorrow...

“Dear Traitor...I hope watching your manhood slither away from you piece by piece is going well. In some ways I’ve happy for what you did. It makes me happy to see you suffer like I have suffered. I know what you are planning and I want you to know that efforts are pointless, much like the fairy tail you will be far too late for a simple little ring to save you. However I will enjoy watching you waste what little time you have. Enjoy your last day as a male tomorrow, the final changes are by far the most painful.”

Always and Forever- S.P.

As you finished reading the letter anger began boil over as you crumpled up the note and threw it away.

“So someone is doing this to you....but who?” Max asked.

“I have no idea! I haven’t had a girlfriend in over a year and she broke up with me! In fact....I’ve always been the one getting dumped...I don’t think I’ve ever broken anyways heart! I’m not some rich playboy burning through women like that fairy tail prince!” You said in protest.

“It said dear traitor...Did you abandon anybody or turn your back on something important?” Max asked.

“Who writes a note for a flashlight?” Joey thought. It was just a simple tool right?

He was about to tear off the note when he suddenly saw a large Warning on the note. Curious Joey pulled off the note and read it.

“Warning! This is not a typical flashlight. While it does shine a bright pink light it has magical properties beyond your understanding....

The light changes whatever is touched by its light into a more feminine version of itself. The knob at the base of the light changes the light’s intensity. 1 is the least feminine and 10 is the most feminine.

Be warned...The light alters reality itself. If something is changed, everyone but the current light holder and those who have used it recently will always believe it was always that way.

Be Very careful! Changes are permanent! There is no way to undo changes once they happen.

“Wow...That’s a lot of work for a dumb joke...” Joey thought as he looked at the light.

He saw it was currently set at a 5. Curiosity however did get the better of him as he turned the light on as he noticed a bright pink light coming from it. He wanted to test it real quick so he shined the light on...
1543333312.title: Read the note first

choices: Use the light on something else
Use the light on another part of your body
15433333121.content:
You put your other hand into the beam of light, and almost instantaneously, your hand shrank, with your fingers becoming daintier as it did. You turned off the light, but after it turned off, your nails started to grow, rounding off at about an inch with rounded tips, that were painted a bright pink color.

"Holy shit!" you exclaimed.

You started to inspect your hand. It was your hand alright, and you could feel it, it still felt pain the same way, but it was... a woman's hand. It shouldn't be possible, but the proof was right in front of you.

"And this is supposed to be halfway feminine... Well I mean, I guess it makes sense. 1 would probably just be a small dainty hand and 10 would be something crazily feminine." you remarked.

You knew it was crazy but... now you were even more curious about the light. Since it was true, and it did work... what was the extent of it? And what of the other settings? Did the light alter your brain to make you more susceptible to it? You didn't know, but you did know that you wanted to...
15433333121.title: His other hand

154333331211.content:
“This thing is insane!” You said looking at your hand and the flashlight.

You had to do another test. To prove this wasn’t all just in your head.

Getting out of the car you looked back to your car. Did it really work on everything?

Turning the light on again you began to shine it on your blue early 2000s Honda Civic. It was a fine car, nothing special, but a gift for your 16th birthday.

As you shined the light on it you saw the paint begin to change. It turned a bright yellow. You saw the stickers of your favorite bands in the rear window change to stickers of pink flowers and quotes like “Live, Laugh, Love.”

You looked at your car now seeing the bright yellow Yellow Honda. It looked like the kind of car any girl your age would drive.

“This thing is crazy! I wonder....” You asked yourself as you looked down to the intensity knob.

Your turned it from a 5 to a 7. You saw the pink light getting brighter. Shinning the light on the car you saw it’s entire body change.

Now instead of beat up early 2000s Honda, you now had much nicer late 2010s Volkswagen Beetle.

The entire car changed. The only thing that remained the same was the numbers on your license plate. Looking inside you saw it was much nicer and very feminine. It reminded you of the type of car a rich cheerleader would drive. You looked in the glove box and saw the registration was still
Made out to you. Just like the warning said...Reality had been changed.

That’s when it began to dawn on you....The warning said these changes were permanent...

“Oh god...What have I done?” You said looking to your car and your hand.

Part of you began to wonder what you might be like as a girl...However you quickly shook those thoughts out of your head.

You had to take this light back...It was far too dangerous...

Hopping in your new car you drove back to the yard sale where you bought it.

To your disappointment and utter shock however, the yard sale was gone when you arrived. Along with the entire house....You were staring at an empty plot of land with nothing more than a sign that said a new house was being built here....

Grabbing the light you looked at it again. Reading over the warning label again looking for anything else. There was only one thing you missed. Written on the back side.

“This item is not refundable...Use with caution. Any attempts to discard or destroy the light will only result in it returning to its owner’s position.”

It seemed like you were stuck with it for now...At least you could hide it away in your room for now.

Driving back home you set on the light on the counter for now. You went to the fridge to get a drink as you heard your brother Triston come downstairs.

Triston was 16 and always seemed to find a way to annoy you. He was Always trying to borrow your car but never putting gas into it. Always talking about girls even though he was just a skinny guy who never had a girlfriend.

“Hey where did you run off to? Is this all you bought? What a weird looking flashlight. Where they all out of guy colors?” He said waving the flashlight around.

You almost spit out your water as you saw him waving it around...

“Hey....Don’t mess with that! Give it Here!” You said reaching it as Triston pulled it away from you teasing.

“What? Something wrong with it? It’s just a light dummy....See?” Triston said turning the light on as he pointed it at....
154333331211.title: Use the light on something else

1543333312111.content:
Triton had the setting on 3 and shone it at your feet and then quickly moved up your body in quite succession.

You are unable to stop him as you felt your whole body change very quickly and suddenly.

Triton then throws the touch on the ground and said "this thing is rubbish..."

You are stood there looking like a tomboy..
1543333312111.title: Your feet

154333332.content:
Free Write: During an English class, you're assigned to write a story about about a specific character, but as you write, you find yourself transforming into her.

RIF: Reading is Feminizing: You pick up a new book at random and as you read the story, you find yourself transforming into the protagonist.
154333332.title: Something different

1543333321.content:
You walked into your university English class, and you could tell that today was going to be different. As you walked in, the professor handed out random slips of paper.

"Don't open them until I say so." the professor said.

Once everyone was seated, the professor walked to the front of the class and started speaking.

"I read the work that you all handed in recently and I've made a decision. I want you all to get out of your comfort zones." the professor said. "The assignment is simple. The sheet of paper you have lists a name and a character archetype. I want you to take what is written on the paper and write a story where you write from the perspective of that character on the paper. All right, get started."

An interesting idea for an assignment... you picked up your slip and unfolded it, finding your character listed. And the one you were given was...
1543333321.title: Free Write

choices: On second thought...You change your mind
15433333211.content:
Rolling your eyes you looked at your essay assignment.

“Sadie Edmonds- A bubbly girly-girl.”

“Great...I get stuck writing about the exact kinds of girls who laughed at me in high-school.” You thought to yourself as you began to think of how to begin.

You hardly had much in the experience if girls let alone really preppy ones. How were you supposed to write something about a type of person you didn’t even know?

As you sat there and thought you began to try and think of all the things that made a so called “girly girl.”

“The color pink, blonde hair, dresses, skirts, high heels, drama...lots of pointless drama.” You thought to yourself as you suddenly laughed figuring it out!

Your story was going to satire and social commentary. Your version of Sadie would start as a total stereotype. Beautiful and sexy, yet selfish and totally self-obsessed. Only concerned with the things in her own life. However somehow she would learn a lesson in humility. She would learn that there is more to life besides herself. She would learn to be a caring person by the end.

While you still needed a strong three act structure to make this story work you had begun to put the framework together for this story as you began writing...
15433333211.title: Sadie Edmonds - A bubbly girly-girl

choices: Natasha looks for a place to sit down
15433333212.content:
The assignment was definitely living up to it's intention. You weren't quite sure where to begin, not just because you weren't a girl, but because you didn't know what it was like being a shy bookworm. You weren't a social butterfly, but you were hardly a shut-in, you went to parties, hung out with people at clubs, went to concerts. A quiet night in with a book sounded sorta boring to you. But it was just an assignment after all.

You pulled out your laptop and started to type:

Natasha Albertson was the shyest girl on campus. In fact, she practically blended in with the walls in most situations. Like most days, between classes, she was headed straight to the campus library to spend her afternoon combing the stacks or reading in a deserted corner. Wearing an ill-fitting sweater, and adjusting her large glasses, she fumbled through her purse for her ID card.

After showing it, she quickly made her way into the rows of shelving and started looking for today's read.

"Hmm..." you thought to yourself. "What should happen to her?"
15433333212.title: Natasha Albertson - A shy bookworm

154333332121.content:
You scratched your head as you tried to think of a good idea... While doing so, you barely registered that your hair and nails were growing at a rapid rate as you scratched. Brushing a stray strand out of your face, you figured out what to write next.

Natasha eventually located a book to read and started to walk back down the stacks, towards her favorite corner, when she abruptly walked into the chest of a large person. Natasha looked up to see a tall man in front of her, she recognized him from one of her classes.

"Hey... Natasha, right?" he asked. "I'm Damien Friedman. We're in Gen Sci together."

Natasha fumbled for the words to say... she wasn't good with talking to people, especially not someone that looked like Damien...

You thought to yourself for a moment... was this the direction it should go? Eh, you could always change it later, but there seemed to be potential with this angle. Your vision started to blur, so you quickly dug into your bag and pulled out a glasses case, putting on your large glasses. You couldn't remember using these before, but the eyestrain was more distracting than the glasses mystery.

"Uh.... yeah...." Natasha looked around for a place to run, but Damien was standing in front of the only path out of there.

"I'm... uh, I'm actually pretty glad I ran into you... You're one of the best students in the class... I was wondering if you could tutor me. I really need to pass this class." Damien said.

"Hmm..." you thought to yourself. "What should she do?"
154333332121.title: Someone approaches Natasha

choices: Natasha decides to call it a day and heads to her dorm.
Natasha takes a brave risk and goes looking for her book.
1543333321212.content:
"S-sorry! GottagethomesoIcanstudyokaybye!" The words just spilled out of Natasha's mouth, and Damien's confusion gave her time to squeeze past him and dash out of the library. She made sure not to look back as she walked far enough to ensure she wouldn't be followed. Behind the corner of a tree, Natasha sighed. "That could've gone better..."

"Excuse me?" a voice to your left called out.

"Aaah!" You yelped, startled by the student interrupting your thoughts. "Oh, sorry..." You put a hand over your heart, taking a deep breath to calm yourself a bit. A few heads turned, but not much else of a reaction from the class.

"Hah, really deep into the assignment, I guess?" the student asked. "Not to bother you, but do you have a phone charger?"

"I think so..." You quickly looked through your backpack and found one underneath your phone, reminding you how outdated the model was. You should probably get a new one eventually, but it's not like you make any calls or use it much at all... "Will this work?"

"That's perfect, thanks!" he shoots you a grin. "Say, do you think-" he starts, but you're already tuning him out and staring at your computer screen, continuing to write.

At the very least, Natasha could get back to her reading in silence. Sure, maybe she'd have to deal with Damien in class tomorrow, but she wasn't going to let herself get so nervous when she had a literary escape right in front of her! "Wait...where's the book?" After a moment of consideration, Natasha slapped her head lightly. "I probably dropped it when I ran..."

"Okay..." you think, "I think the next thing she should do is..."
1543333321212.title: Natasha refuses and runs away

choices: You decide to do some research
154333332131.content:
You look towards your sheet.
Layla Rita always had her eyes on the girls, rather than the guys. Now out of high school, she is ready to take her relationship with wannabe lolita girl Melody to the next level. Of course, there was the matter of keeping her goth looks and trying something like Melody's look.
"Huh..." you thought, not at all sure of how to go with this. On one hand, you could just get to writing this. Or you could do some research and get a better idea of what you want to do.
154333332131.title: Layla Rita - Lesbian Goth

choices: Liz- A stripper with dreams of becoming a singer
Lori- A shy college girl hiding a supernatural secret
1543333322.content:
You weren’t quite sure how the book got into your bag. You were heading back to your dorm room one evening when you noticed an odd book in your backpack. Picking it up you noticed it wasn’t a typical school book. It seemed like a fiction of some kind. Flipping through the pages you realized it was a story book. Maybe it was worth reading? You shrugged for a moment as your began to flip through the pages.

Now who is the main character?
1543333322.title: RIF

15433333221.content:
To your surprise it was actually an interesting story about a girl named Liz as you sat down to read.

As Liz finished applying her makeup in the dressing room she heard the shouts and whistles of the drunk men throwing their cash at the dancers on stage.

Liz worked at the Wild Heart Lounge. A popular strip club and bar in town. Like most of the girls here Liz wasn’t here by choice. She moved to the city after high school to pursue her dreams of being a stage performer. Life unfortunately has a really cruel sense of irony sometimes...

It was hard to believe she had been here a year now. As Liz looked at herself in the mirror checking herself out she hardly recognized the girl in the mirror anymore. Gone was the sweet and cute girl from school. The one singing her heart out on stage. Doing the national Anthem for the all the football games, winning the local talent shows. Voted most like to get famous in the year book.

The girl Liz saw now was like a twisted reflection of the girl she once was. Over the last few months at her bosses “suggestion” she had recently had some work done to quote
”Improve” nightly tip generation.

Her once light brown hair had now been bleached a bright platinum blonde. She had been growing it out too so it now reached almost to her butt.

Her once light complexion and skin tone was now a sun tanned bronze thanks to all the tanning sessions she had been to.

Worst of all however were the two new huge rounded globes sticking out from her chest...

Liz always had a modest bust growing up. Large B or small C cups. However it was clear that if you wanted to bring home the big bucks large jugs were the easiest way to increase tips.

Now Liz was stuck still paying off these giant DDs to repay the loan she got from her own boss to get them.

When she first started Liz thought her natural skills in dance and singing would be enough, but it seemed most men preferred girls with what her boss Tommy called “The WOW Factor!” Which was code for looking as slutty as possible.

Liz wanted nothing more than to escape and run away. She felt trapped in her job. Trapped in her body. Just trapped in life. All she wanted was for someone or something to take her far away...

Liz finished her makeup as the DJ began shouting her name. It was time to earn her keep.

——————————————————-

You paused finishing up the first chapter. So far it seemed like an interesting set up. You were curious what was going to happen. Looking back to the book you failed to notice your hair was slowly beginning to grow as it began to grow a bit lighter in color as well.
15433333221.title: Liz- A stripper with dreams of becoming a singer

15433333222.content:
You began to read the story about Lori:

Lori was not your typical 21 college junior. She didn’t party, or go on dates. She hardly left her apartment. If not for her roommate and only friend Jessica she would hardly go out at all...

It wasn’t your typical social hang ups like shyness. Lori was actually quite cute. She had a skinny and petite figure and long straight dark chestnut hair that came down to her waist. She wore dark rimmed glasses and always dressed conservatively when possible.

Lori avoided social situations at all cost. Not because she was just really shy. She had to prevent....”Her” from ever coming out. You see Lori had another side to herself. One no one ever saw...And she preferred to keep it that way.

You see, the truth is that Lori...
15433333222.title: Lori- A shy college girl hiding a supernatural ...

choices: Something goes wrong and Lori escapes captivity
A werewolf hunter comes to town
154333332221.content:
Lori hadn't always been a werewolf, but a shortcut through the park one night on the way home from a friend's house in high school, led to the fateful encounter. At first, she thought she had been attacked by a dog, in fact, it was why she had gotten so close to the werewolf in the first place, she thought it was a lost dog that needed help finding their owner.

The "dog" bit her, and ran away. She didn't think much of it at the time, apart from possible rabies, and the wound healed up, but a month later, during the full moon, she suffered her first transformation, blacking out and waking up in torn clothing the next morning. Rumors of a dog on the loose and Jessica having researched into the occult for an assignment she was working on, led her to piece together what was happening to her.

She withdrew after that, cutting out all extra-circulars, and mostly keeping to herself. Moving out was less about independence, and more about protecting her parents in the event of a transformation. She lived with Jessica because she was her only confidant that she trusted with the knowledge of her secret. Jessica and Lori had a system, during the full moon, Lori would be locked in a room until the transformation ended, the story to the other tenants being that they were dog-sitting that night.

But everything was about to change during the next full moon...

"Wow! This is an interesting premise..." you remarked as you read on.
154333332221.title: Is a werewolf

1543333322211.content:
As you read your work you failed to notice your own hair was getting longer. This story was quite interesting as you continued to read on...

Chapter 3- A mistake on the calendar.

“Are you sure about this?” Lori asked Jessica as she looked to herself.

Lori was dressed up to go out with Jessica tonight. She was wearing a dress for the first time in long time. It was tight and much shorter than she normally would have liked. She was even wearing high heels. With her hair and makeup done up Lori looked quite cute for once.

Jessica had insisted she join her for the dance on campus. There were going to be lots of cute boys and it was rare to have such a social occasion this close by.

Lori normally didn’t hate dances or dates. Before the bite she went to quite a few herself. However ever since she had never felt comfortable going out like this Especially tonight.

The full moon was tomorrow and Lori was already getting anxious. Jessica however has begged her a dozen times to come out and finally gotten her to agree. As long as they were safe and smart everything should be fine.

The two girls left their apartment and went off to the the dance. On their fridge was a calendar with the full moon dates all circled. There was just one small mistake....

Because this year was a leap year they had failed to remember that the full moon was actually starting tonight...
1543333322211.title: Something goes wrong and Lori escapes captivity

15433333222111.content:
As you flipped a page, you didn't notice that your hands were becoming much more slender, and your nails were growing out.

Lori was having fun at the dance. A few drinks, a good song, and all of Lori's inhibitions and anxiety went away. Sure, it was still in the back of her mind, but she could enjoy today before tomorrow started. Jessica was a few feet away dancing with a guy, while Lori did the same. As she danced, she suddenly felt a flush of heat come over her.

"Oh no..." Lori muttered.

"What's wrong?" the guy asked.

"Uh... n-nothing." Lori replied.

This shouldn't be happening this early! Lori quickly looked around for Jessica, but the crowds had shifted and she couldn't see her.

"I have to go!" Lori exclaimed and rushed towards the door.

"Wait!" the guy beckoned, but she was gone.

Lori rushed towards the women's restroom and stumbled over to the sink. She looked into the mirror and saw that she was sweaty and her eyes were starting to turn yellow.

"Not yet... please, I have to get..." she cried.

Her stomach turned and Lori clutched it, stumbling into a bathroom stall. She collapsed onto the toilet.

"This was getting good!" you thought to yourself.

You quickly brushed a strand of hair out of your face as you kept reading.
15433333222111.title: While at the dance
